Name: Home for the Holidays
Description: After losing her job, making out with her soon-to-be former boss, and finding out that her daughter plans to spend Thanksgiving with her boyfriend, Claudia Larson faces spending the holiday with her family.

Name: Dentist on the Job

Name: Man of the Century

Name: Monte Carlo

Name: Frightmare

Name: Bolero

Name: Poh wai ji wong

Name: Vampire in Brooklyn
Description: A ship docks in Brooklyn with all its crew dead, but someone gets off and the killing continues on land. A Caribbean vampire is searching for a specific woman, half-human half-vampire. Rita is the detective investigating the many ...

Name: Song of the South

Name: Hercules Returns
Description: When Brad quits his job at a large cinema chain, to open his own picture theatre, his ex-boss sabotages the opening night by switching the Italian film with a non-subtitled version. Brad and his team hilariously improvise the dial...

Name: Thor: Ragnarok

Name: Whale Music

Name: Nae yeojaeui namja chingu

Name: S tebou me bav√≠ svet
Description: Three middle-aged men go for a vacation with their children and learn to cope with their needs without their wives. Quickly, they plan to exhaust the kids to have some time off, but nothing really works out as planned.

Name: Skippy

Name: Sibha kham doan sib ed

Name: Fan chan
Description: Jeab hears that his childhood sweetheart Noi-Naa is to be married, so he makes the trip back home to his provincial village. As he does so, the memories come flooding back to his childhood in 1980s Thailand. He remembers always be...

Name: Gregory's Two Girls
Description: Bill Forsyth returns to the romantic comedy of 'Gregory's Girl.' 20 years after his teenage crush on a football-mad schoolgirl, Gregory is back at his old school, teaching English. When two of his pupils uncover evil practices at ...

Name: La Bamba 2: Hell Is a Drag

Name: Io, Chiara e lo scuro
Description: Francesco, nicknamed 'Toscano', is a very good pool player but he never wins when he plays for money. He meets Chiara, a saxophone player, on a late night bus by swapping his case containing the cue with her one, containing the sa...

Name: ParaNorman

Name: A Kid for Two Farthings
Description: In a lower-class London community of small shops, open-air vendors and flea-marketers, Joe, a small boy, lives with his mother, Joanne, who works in and rooms above the Kandinsky tailor shop. Joe is innocently and earnestly determ...

Name: An Ideal Husband

Name: Chyornaya roza - emblema pechali, krasnaya roza - emblema lyubvi
Description: In fact, people who then appear around Mitya are all unique, eccentric and the space of the apartment house begins to have an unrealistic character as a miniature of unstable society in the end of Soviet Union.

Name: Davitelj protiv davitelja

Name: Dennis the Menace Strikes Again!

Description: Patricia O'Grady is the daughter of Irish Vaudeville performer, Rosie O'Grady, and is being raised along with her sisters by her father who believes the Vaudeville life contributed to his wife's early demise. Thus he doesn't want ...

Name: Rockula

Name: Lady in White

Description: Pablo knows already, in his twenties, what he wants from life: to become a musician, be likeable to his mother, and find a lovely, faithful and nice boy to share the rest of his life with. Pablo suffers a difficult emotional crisi...

Name: Doctor Dolittle

Name: RiffTrax: Ator the Fighting Eagle
Description: An origin story of a cave dwelling warrior that involves a sister-wife, a trusty bear cub and an evil spider priest

Name: Allegro squadrone

Name: K√¶rlighedens melodi

Name: Untitled Shrek Reboot

Name: Sleeping Beauties
Description: Awakened from a curse, Sleeping Beauty marvels at the wonders of the new century. She falls in love with a famous architect who is working to restore the castle she once lived in, but finds there are enemies plotting against her. ...

Name: Pel√≠sky
Description: Two families, Sebkovi and Krausovi, are celebrating christmas, but not everyone is in a good mood. Teenage kids think their fathers are totaly stupid, fathers are sure their children are nothing more than rebels, hating anything t...

Name: As Bodas de Deus

Name: Domani accadr√†
Description: Edo and Lupo are two countrymen running away after having robbed their boss. They are chased by 3 mercernaries. They will meet real gangsters, then some excentric nobles. At this time, they are separated for an experiment. Edo is ...

Name: My Name is Mo'Nique

Name: Lady Luck
Description: Through their individual trials and turbulence, three strangers are drawn together under one roof. Gabriele is running from a philandering, egotistical, soon-to-be former husband while finding a renewed sense of love in Dr. Perry....

After a whirlwind romance, Maddie is preparing to marry gorgeous Italian Raf, and has invited her sister Taylor to the wedding. Unbeknownst to Maddie, however, Raf is Taylor's ex-holiday flame, and the love of her life... By: Vertigo Films

Name: Paddington 3
Description: Plot undisclosed. The third installment of the Paddington films.

Name: Les 12 travaux d'Ast√©rix

Name: Men with Brooms
Description: Four men take time from their personal problems to reunite as a curling team and compete in a bonspiel that will restore their honour.

Name: Class Cruise
Description: A few pupils from County High are selected to be the first to go on a study cruise, a privilege that formerly was reserved for members of private schools. Sam, Boz, Staci and Kim struggle to fit in, but the snobs do everything to ...

Name: The Young Poisoner's Handbook
Description: This film is based on a true story about a British teenager who allegedly poisoned family, friends, and co-workers. Graham is highly intelligent, but completely amoral. He becomes interested in science, especially chemistry, and b...

Name: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
Description: A tug-of-war between Elmo and his friend sends his blanket to faraway Grouchland, a place full of grouchy creatures and the villainous Huxley. Elmo embarks on a rescue mission, learning important lessons about sharing and responsi...

Name: Eddie Murphy: Raw

Description: The Cobblers Arms have been the best and most feared Amateur Rugby League team for the past ten years. Ex-pro Arthur bets their boss that he could train a bunch of deadbeats to defeat them in a local rugby sevens tournament. But t...

Name: Blood Beach
Description: Something or someone is attacking people one by one on the beach. Some of them are mutilated, but most of them are sucked into the sand, disappearing without a trace. What is the creature responsible? Where does it live, and where...

Name: Simply Irresistible
Description: A magical crab works wonders for a terrible chef's culinary skills, leading her towards the man of her dreams.

Name: Tatie Danielle

Description: The story of the fictional student-run Campus Security team, their former glory now tainted as they struggle to prove their worth. The three remaining members have to balance fighting bad guys with not getting flunked, as they hav...

Name: Davitelj protiv davitelja
Description: A mentally-disturbed flower seller starts killing young girls on the streets of Belgrade. While the frustrated police inspector is trying to stop him, an aspiring musician finds his life and work deeply intertwined with that of a ...

Name: Shakti
Description: A scrupulously honest cop refuses kidnappers' demands at grave risk to the life of his son. The son is rescued but lives forever scarred by his father's willingness to sacrifice his own son for the sake of his principles. This wor...

Name: L.A. Hit
Description: Din Kalia a lonely taxi driver who hears all the good things happening into his passengers lives, is going through some troubled times. One night he gives a ride to two passengers, Russell Law and Gus Vincent. They seem to be pret...

Name: The Supergrass
Description: While taking a holiday in the country with his mother, Dennis hits on a scheme to impress a girl so that she'll go away on a trip with him as his girlfriend. Although he fails to gain any interest from the girl, the police take a ...

Name: Puppet on a Chain
Description: Following a triple professional hit a U.S. agent arrives in Amsterdam to investigate a heroin smuggling ring. He finds a city rife with drugs and a police force unable or unwilling to do much about it. With his incognito female fe...

Name: 10 Rillington Place

Name: Penitentiary
Description: A hitchhiker named Martel Gordone gets in a fight with two bikers over a prostitute, and one of the bikers is killed. Gordone is arrested and sent to prison, where he joins the prison's boxing team in an effort to secure an early ...

Name: Under Cover
Description: A cop goes undercover in a South Carolina high school. With the help of a local narcotics officer, he investigates the drug ring responsible for another cop's death.

Name: Home Alone 3
Description: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

Name: The Client
Description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

Name: Girl in Gold Boots

Name: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka

Name: The Basketball Diaries

Name: Holy Matrimony

Name: Smilla's Sense of Snow

Name: Band of the Hand
Description: Five juvenile lost causes are sent to the Everglades where a war veteran tries to reform them using survival tactics. Their new skills and resolve are tested when a Miami drug lord targets them for trying to clean up their neighbo...

Name: Poodle Springs
Description: An aging Phillip Marlowe gets mixed up with blackmail and murder amongst the elite social set in 1963.

Name: Tougher Than Leather
Description: Legendary hip-hop group Run-D.M.C. stars in this cross between a blaxploitation film and a spaghetti western. They must find and punish the evil drug lord-record company executive who murdered their friend. Along the way, they enc...

Name: Fast Getaway
Description: A lighthearted tale about a gang of bank robbers who fall out and split up. The brains of the gang is a boy who, with his father, successfully continue their crime spree. Annoyed at this, Lilly and her loyal and stupid companion, ...

Name: Speed 2: Cruise Control

Name: Romeo Must Die
Description: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

Name: The Wolf of Wall Street

Name: R.S.V.P.

Name: Karakter
Description: Jacob Katadreuffe lives mute with his mother, has no contact with his father who only works against him and wants to become a lawyer, at all costs.

Name: Gun Shy

Name: Mona Lisa
Description: A man recently released from prison manages to get a job driving a call girl from customer to customer.

Name: Adventures in Babysitting

Name: Two If by Sea

Name: Ying hung boon sik

Name: Ariel

Name: Bob le flambeur

Name: Bury Me Dead
Description: Barbara Carlin attends her own funeral and returns home suspecting that her husband, Rod Carlin, had tried to do away with her, and is also (rightfully) curious as to just who was the woman buried under her name. She learns that t...

Description: Two guards fighting through a power breakdown inside the secret 'Death House' prison must fight to survive ruthless inmates and even supernatural horrors.

Name: Rozpusten√Ω a vypusten√Ω
Description: A police inspector and inexperienced trainee search for a mysteriously disappeared manufacturer of ointments for hair growth.

Name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
Description: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

Name: Max Manus
Description: The true story about one of the most brilliant saboteurs during World War II and his battle to overcome his inner demons.

Name: American Gigolo
Description: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female client√®le, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

Name: Joe
Description: An ex-con, who is the unlikeliest of role models, meets a 15-year-old boy and is faced with the choice of redemption or ruin.

Name: Daleun... haega kkuneun kkum

Description: An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.

Description: Charlie visits a wealthy country home in England. Suspects in the murder range from a housekeeper, to a stableman, to a lawyer.

Name: Arjun
Description: Arjun Malvankar after his graduation thrives to get job. The corruption and injustice taking place in his community frustrates him to the extent of revolting with the help of some of his friends. This path of his gets him into ser...

Name: Beverly Hills Cop
Description: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

Name: Keys to Tulsa
Description: Richter is a lazy son of a wealthy woman, who's put up with too much so no more money. He's about to lose his local newspaper job arranged by his mom. Richter owes money to a violent drug dealer/blackmailer but sees his wife. Deat...

Name: Tango & Cash

Name: Akilla's Escape
Description: In a crime-noir about the urban child-soldier, Akilla Brown captures a fifteen-year-old Jamaican boy in the aftermath of an armed robbery. Over one gruelling night, Akilla confronts a cycle of generational violence he thought he e...

Name: The Lucky Stiff
Description: Semi-successful lawyer John Malone is intrigued by local night club singer Anna Marie St. Clair. After meeting her at the club, he is present when her boss (and more?) is killed, and she is arrested for the crime. Sentenced to dea...

Name: Das Geheimnis der gelben M√∂nche
Description: A secret agent battles a secret brainwashing organisation.

Name: Kamikaze takush√Æ

Name: Emil and the Detectives
Description: Emil goes to Berlin to see his grandmother with a large amount of money and is offered sweets by a strange man that make him sleep. He wakes up at his stop with no money. It is up to him and a group of children to save the day.

Name: Eyewitness
Description: A janitor who claims he's seen a murder becomes romantically involved with the glamorous TV reporter covering the story.

Name: Aaj Ka Arjun
Description: Bhim Singh is an orphan who lives a poor life-style in a small community. He is the guardian to his only sister, Laxmi, who he has educated in the city, she meets Ajit Singh the son of Thakur Bhupendra Singh and both falls in love...

Name: Chalard games goeng
Description: Lynn, a genius high school student who makes money by cheating tests, receives a new task that leads her to set foot on Sydney, Australia. In order to complete the millions-Baht task, Lynn and her classmates have to finish the int...

Description: Hired by the deceased's ex-wife, a private eye checks out the death of a gay man who had AIDS.

Name: Blown Away
Description: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

Name: Delusion
Description: A man who has just embezzled money from his company is driving through the Nevada desert. He picks up a pretty girl and her seemingly goofy boyfriend. The girl is a Las Vegas showgirl and the boyfriend turns out to be a profession...

Name: Dial M for Murder

Name: Veronica Guerin

Name: Fargo

Name: Shadows in the Storm
Description: A married man suffering from midlife crisis obsesses over a girl from his romantic fantasy. He meets her exact duplicate on vacation and helps her get rid of her abusive husband. They run off together but a caller starts blackmail...

Name: Above the Law
Description: A former Special Operations Vietnam vet works as a Chicago cop, and uncovers C.I.A. wrongdoing.

Name: Riders
Description: A gang of extreme sportsmen raises the stakes in their criminal activities.

Name: P√©ril en la demeure
Description: A magnate and his younger wife hire David to teach guitar to their teenage daughter. The wife quickly seduces David, and simultaneously he strikes up an acquaintance with the family's inquisitive neighbor. One night, David is mugg...

Name: Home Sweet Home Alone
Description: A married couple tries to steal back a valuable heirloom from a troublesome kid.

Name: Funny Face
Description: The destruction of his grandparents' home leads a young man to take revenge under a masked persona.

Name: Gamunui yeonggwang
Description: Mrs. Hong is the crime boss for a large mafia group. She orders her two sons, Kyung-Jae and Suk-Jae to find an elite wife for her eldest son In-Jae...

Name: Grand Canary
Description: In the Canary Islands, a missionary girl tries to reform a derelict doctor, who finds true love elsewhere.

Name: The Boss of Big Town

Description: Tough Miami P.I., Tony Rome's hired by a millionaire to find jewelry stolen from his daughter. In the search, he has several encounters with local hoods as well as the Miami's police.

Name: The Young Poisoner's Handbook
Description: This film is based on a true story about a British teenager who allegedly poisoned family, friends, and co-workers. Graham is highly intelligent, but completely amoral. He becomes interested in science, especially chemistry, and b...

Name: Tread Softly Stranger
Description: An irresistible temptress causes trouble between two brothers when the more handsome charismatic ones turns up, leading to robbery and death.

Name: Big Daddy
Description: A visitor to the Everglades swamps in Florida encounters and falls in love with an uneducated girl. But he finds competition for her affections from the unlikely and mysterious A. Beauregard Lincoln. He also discovers danger from ...

Name: Kill Me Later

Name: Qing shao nian nuo zha
Description: Within the urban gloom of Taipei, four youths face alienation, loneliness, and moments of existential crisis amidst a series of minor crimes.

Name: Retroactive

Name: Body Heat
Description: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

Name: All About the Benjamins
Description: Bounty hunter Bucum chases bail-jumper Reggie, who runs right into the scene of a diamond heist and murder and gets shot at as well. Later they become partners in their pursuit of the $20M in diamonds and lottery ticket. Their wom...

Name: Fallen Angels

Name: Welcome Home

Name: The Walking Stick
Description: A young woman's highly ordered and structured life is turned upside-down when she meets a handsome stranger at a party. Friendship soon develops into romance and for the first time in her life she is truly happy. This happiness is...

Name: Sicario

Name: Big Eyes
Description: A drama about the awakening of painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

Description: A duke dies and leaves the title and wealth to his adult son. But who's the real son: the found baby raised in USA or the abandoned baby raised by a Hindi family in London? Comedy follows.

Name: Aus dem Nichts

Name: The Man Who Returned to Life
Description: David Jamieson, a Northerner, is forced to flee from a Maryland town where he is suspected of murdering the girl who attempted to force him to marry her on the eve of his wedding to another girl. He flees and assumes a new identit...

Name: The Big Knife

Name: The Detective
Description: Police detective Joe Leland investigates the murder of a gay man. While investigating, he discovers links to official corruption in New York City in this drama that delves into a world of sex and drugs.

Name: Peter Rabbit

Name: Nicotina
Description: A real-time dark comedy about a science geek who tangles with a clutch of Russian gangsters after he delivers them the wrong computer disk.

Name: Boomerang
Description: 'Yesterday's tragedy is today's comedy.' Caffe 'Boomerang' is one of Belgrade's many cafes. Seemingly just a backdrop for our cast of crazy characters, but in reality much more than that. It stoically puts up with its guests, and ...

Name: Blaze

Name: Ningen no sh√¥mei
Description: When an American is murdered in a Japanese inn, Tokyo police Detective Munesue follows the trail of the killer to New York City. There he is joined by Detective Shuftan, and together they sort out the crime.

Name: Beware, My Lovely

Name: Three Steps North

Name: The Girl with No Number

On the road with only 197 dollars to their name, Bridger a... Read all

Name: Philadelphia

Name: All Over Me
Description: Claude and Ellen are best friends who live in a not-so-nice area of New York. They're involved in the subculture of '90s youth, complete with drugs, live music, and homophobia. All is changed one night when a violent, meaningless ...

Name: Akilla's Escape

Name: Raining Stones
Description: This Ken Loach film tells the story of a man devoted to his family and his religion. Proud, though poor, Bob wants his little girl to have a beautiful (and costly) brand-new dress for her First Communion. His stubbornness and dete...

Name: Monkey Warfare

Name: Humoresque

Name: Arjun
Description: Arjun Malvankar after his graduation thrives to get job. The corruption and injustice taking place in his community frustrates him to the extent of revolting with the help of some of his friends. This path of his gets him into ser...

Name: Bury Me Dead

Name: Gabbeh

Name: Les f√©lins
Description: A petty criminal seeks refuge in a house owned by two wealthy American women.

Name: The Spectacular Now
Description: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

Name: The Luck of a Sailor

Name: When Harry Met Sally...

Name: The Age of Love
Description: THE AGE OF LOVE follows the playful, poignant adventures of 30 seniors who attend a unique speed dating event for 70 to 90-year-olds and discover how the search for love changes-or doesn't change-from first love to the far reaches...

Name: Sonnenallee
Description: A group of kids grows up on the short, wrong (east) side of the Sonnenallee in Berlin, right next to one of the few border crossings between East and West reserved for German citizens. The antics of these kids, their families, the...

Name: The Tuttles of Tahiti
Description: After a long absence from the island, Chester Tuttle returns to Tahiti to find that little has changed. His large family, particularly his scheming Uncle Jonas, would rather dance and romance than earn a living. When Jonas loses t...

Name: Staircase

Description: Nicole and Chase used to be BFFs, then junior high happened. The high school centennial dance is coming but Nicole gets dumped. So does Chase. They stage a relationship to get at their exes. They visit each other's worlds. Love in...

Description: The story of Pascal Ichak, a larger-than-life French traveller, bon vivant, and chef, who falls in love with Georgia and a Georgian princess in the early 1920s. All is well until the arrival of the Red Army of the Caucasus, as the...

Name: Floating

Name: Mar√≠a Candelaria (Xochimilco)
Description: In Xochimilco 1909, Mar√≠a Candelaria and Lorenzo Rafael long for getting married but the odds are against them. Mar√≠a Candelaria is segregated for being a prostitute's child and the couple faces the greed of Mr. Damian, the town's...

Name: Genova
Description: A man moves his two daughters to Italy after their mother dies in a car accident, in order to revitalize their lives. Genova changes all three of them as the youngest daughter starts to see the ghost of her mother, while the older...

Name: Entertaining Angels: The Dorothy Day Story
Description: Chronicles the life of Dorothy Day who dedicated herself in service to her socialist beliefs and her adopted faith of Catholicism. The movement she created continues to thrive to this day, with more than 200 communities across the...

Description: Shiek Yousseff, poses as a friend of the French while secretly plotting to overthrow them. Apposing Yousseff are the Riffs, whose secret leader, The Red Shadow, is Paul Bonnard, a professor who is studying the desert, and whose at...

Name: Benvenuta

Name: Bounce

Name: La truite

Name: Mies vailla menneisyytt√§

Name: Agnes Browne
Description: The unexpected death of her husband sends a woman and her seven children, ages 2-14, into emotional turmoil and financial crisis in 1967 Dublin. She is forced to borrow money from a ruthless loan shark to make ends meet. She faces...

Name: A Man Called Ove
Description: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

Name: A Rainy Day in New York
Description: A young couple arrives in New York for a weekend where they are met with bad weather and a series of adventures.

Name: Fathers' Day
Description: A woman cons two old boyfriends into searching for her runaway son by convincing both that they are the boy's father.

Name: Cash McCall
Description: James Garner put in a winning performance as a similarly unreconstructed capitalist in the grip of merger mania.

Name: At First Sight
Description: A blind man has an operation to regain his sight at the urging of his girlfriend and must deal with the changes to his life.

Name: The Raffle
Description: Two out of work men come up with a money-making promotion to find the most beautiful woman in the world and to set up a raffle where the winner wins a date with her.

Name: Second Chorus
Description: When perennial college students Danny O'Neill and Hank Taylor are forced to make it on their own, the competitive pair get jobs with Artie Shaw's band and reunite with ex-manager Ellen Miller.

Name: Blonde
Description: The story of American actress Marilyn Monroe, covering her love and professional lives.

Name: The Heartbreak Kid
Description: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

Name: Hyderabad Blues
Description: The protagonist of Hyderabad Blues is Varun, played by the director, Nagesh Kukunoor. The movie revolves around his visit home after 12 years in the USA and his resulting culture shock.

Name: Rock Around the Clock
Description: Orchestra manager Steve Hollis realizes that big-band music is dead. People want something new, but what? On their way to New York, Steve and his companion Corny, stop at a motel in a small place called Strawberry Springs. It's Sa...

Name: Second Act
Description: A big box store worker reinvents her life and her life-story and shows Madison Avenue what street smarts can do.

Name: Stars at Noon
Description: A young American journalist stranded in present-day Nicaragua falls for an enigmatic Englishman who seems like her best chance of escape. She soon realizes, however, that he may be in even greater danger than she is.

Name: Dil Ka Rishta
Description: A man faces a dilemma after he accidentally kills his lover's fiancee and hides this secret from her, not knowing that it may create a rift in their lives.

Name: Follow the Fleet
Description: A Navy sailor tries to rekindle a romance with the woman he loves while on liberty in San Francisco.

Name: Big Bad Love
Description: Barlow is a hard-drinking, heavy-smoking, long-haired, and deeply unhappy aspiring writer who pulls a dozen rejection slips out of his mailbox every day while trying to get through his life with some semblance of purpose.

Name: Another Life
Description: A woman is wrongly accused of murdering her husband in the early 1920s, in London.

Name: Committed
Description: A chance meeting between a man being pressured to propose to his girlfriend and a runaway bride.

Name: Get a Life, alright!
Description: A young struggling actor gets a lucky break after delivering flowers on set and falls for the leading actress and becomes a target for jealousy, all thanks to fame.

Name: Anna and the King of Siam
Description: In 1862, a young Englishwoman becomes royal tutor in Siam and befriends the King.

Name: The Love Witch
Description: A modern-day witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, with deadly consequences.
A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

Name: You Can't Fool Your Wife
Description: The marriage of college sweethearts Andrew and Clara is going stale after 5 years. Andrew is a hard worker at the firm, but it seems that all he does is work. When Mr. Battincourt from London must be entertained, Andrew gets stuck...

Name: Only You
Description: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.

Name: I Origins

Name: Edward Scissorhands

Name: Hideous Kinky
Description: Unsatisfied with her life in England, young mother Julia relocates to Morocco with her small daughters, Lucy and Bea. Although the family enjoys various adventures, they struggle to make ends meet.

Name: Fire Island
Description: A group of queer best friends gather in Fire Island Pines for their annual week of love and laughter, but a sudden change of events might make this their last summer in gay paradise.

Name: Yi yi
Description: Each member of a middle-class Taipei family seeks to reconcile past and present relationships within their daily lives.

Name: Gaby: A True Story
Description: The life of Gaby Brimmer, a girl physically handicapped, who finally gets her goals of study and triumph.

Name: This Means War
Description: C.I.A. operatives wage an epic battle on each other when they discover they are dating the same woman.

Name: Little Italy
Description: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.

Name: Milk & Money
Description: When David drops out of medical school, he finds out what life isn't really like. He meets beautiful women, holds a box, helps make a movie, and takes care of 21 cows.

Name: Toki o kakeru sh√¥jo
Description: A high-school girl acquires the ability to time travel.

Name: If Ever I See You Again
Description: Bob Morrison, a successful composer of TV commercial jingles, is unhappy with his his lack of creative freedom in developing the definitive dog-food song. Frustrated, he heads out to Hollywood to score a movie. While in California...

Name: The Big Street
Description: A busboy in unrequited love with a nightclub performer grows closer to her after she is paralyzed in an attack by her gangster boyfriend.

Name: Before the Rains
Description: A English spice baron settles in South India during the waning years of the Raj.

Name: Waterloo Road
Description: A drama set during World War II. A tale of adultery and desertion.

Name: Jack & Sarah
Description: A young American woman becomes a nanny in the home of a recent British widower.

Name: Oriundi
Description: In a love story set in Curitiba, Southern Brazil, a patriarch witnesses the crumbling of his life-long family business at the hands of his descendants. Suddenly Sofia appears. Is she from this world, and is she the key to this fam...

Name: Hot Summer Nights
Description: In 1991, a sheltered teenage boy comes of age during a wild summer he spends on Cape Cod getting rich from selling pot to gangsters, falling in love for the first time, partying and eventually realizing that he is in over his head.

Name: LOL
Description: As a new year at school begins, Lola's heart is broken by her boyfriend, though soon she's surprised by her best friend, promising musician Kyle, who reveals his feelings for her.

Name: Hackers
Description: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

Name: The Broadway Melody
Description: A pair of sisters from the vaudeville circuit try to make it big time on Broadway, but matters of the heart complicate the attempt.

Name: Two Small Bodies
Description: Eileen Maloney, a hostess at a strip joint, has woken up to find her two children are missing. Lieutenant Bramm suspects that she killed them herself. He questions her for days about her lifestyle, her children, her ex-husband, me...

Name: Much Ado About Nothing
Description: Young lovers, and soon to wed, Hero and Claudio conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles, Benedick and Beatrice, to wed as well.

Name: Hope Floats
Description: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.

Name: Employees' Entrance

Name: Man of the Century

Name: The Spanish Main

Name: Holidate

Name: Doppelganger
Description: A writer with a room for rent acquires a strange new roommate with a psychotic alter-ego that follows her wherever she goes.

Name: Men with Brooms
Description: Four men take time from their personal problems to reunite as a curling team and compete in a bonspiel that will restore their honour.

Name: Tini zabutykh predkiv

Name: The Land Girls

Name: The Princess Diaries

Name: Lovesick
Description: Charlie has everything: a great job, friends, family, the whole package. However, he doesn't have love.

Name: After
Description: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.

Name: The Pursuit of Happiness
Description: Lederer is a Hessian soldier who defects to the Americans during the Revolutionary War.He falls in love with a Yankee girl, but a thuggish local militiaman jealously makes things hard for him while he's a prisoner of war.

Name: Surrender Dorothy
Description: Lahn is a heroin addict who will do anything for his dose. He robs a dealer and bumps into Trevor, who works at a restaurant. He gives him shelter, but for that turns him into his slave, makes him dress in drag, and names him Doro...

Name: Cos√¨ come sei
Description: Stuck in a dysfunctional marriage, a middle-aged architect has a chance encounter with an alluring student and they start an affair. He wants to be loved; she needs a meaningful relationship. However--could he be her missing father?

Name: I Am Dragon
Description: In the midst of the wedding princess Miroslava is kidnapped by a dragon and carried away into his castle on the remote island.

Name: Bride Wars
Description: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.

Name: Color of Night
Description: A color-blind psychiatrist is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that he begins having intense sexual encounters with.

Name: North to Alaska
Description: During the Alaska gold rush, prospector George sends partner Sam to Seattle to bring his fianc√©e but when it turns out that she married another man, Sam returns with a pretty substitute, the hostess of the Henhouse dance hall.

Name: Yentl
Description: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

Name: Sex Drive
Description: A high-school senior drives cross-country with his best friends to hook up with a babe he met online.

Name: Como agua para chocolate
Description: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

Name: L'√©cole de la chair
Description: Fashion executive Dominique's obsession for Quentin, a young bisexual hustler, fills her desire for physical love but leaves her taxed emotionally. Twists and turns in the relationship, along with the man's violent and abusive nat...

Name: The Wedding Date
Description: Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis to hire a male escort to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fianc√©, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.

Name: The Sweetest Thing
Description: Christina Walters spent years avoiding men, then suddenly met her perfect match while hanging with her best friends, Courtney and Jane. When she finds out that he has left town, she and Courtney set out on a trip.

Name: Praise This
Description: Youth choirs gather together for a music competition.

Name: A Perfect Pairing
Description: It follows a hard-driving LA wine-company executive who travels to an Australian sheep station to land a major client and there she ends up working as a ranch hand and sparking with a rugged local.

Name: The Provocateur
Description: Hope is in a new passionate relationship and has a good job but soon finds her world turned upside down when her personal life becomes entangled with her work life.

Name: Daybreak
Description: The whole movie occurs entirely in one place; a big white vacation house in Tagaytay, Cavite and only with two male characters. In a single narrative time, intending by way of voyeurism, the film allows viewers to discover what ha...

Name: Memoirs of an Invisible Man

Name: Notorious
Description: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

Name: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
Description: An intimate look at the extraordinary rise, fall and redemption of televangelist Tammy Faye Bakker.

Name: The Jungle Book
Description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

Name: Yes Man
Description: A man challenges himself to say "yes" to everything.

Name: De Poolse bruid
Description: Polish deceived woman hides from pimps on a Dutch farm, and shares an intriguing romance with the farmer.

Name: Great Expectations
Description: Modernization of Charles Dickens' classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

Name: Saajan
Description: A poet (Sanjay Dutt) and his best friend (Salman Khan) fall in love with the same woman (Madhuri Dixit).

Name: Downton Abbey

Name: Prom Pact
Description: Follows the main character, a feminist who doesn't believe in the idea of falling in love, especially in heteronormative love, but then she falls and there's undeniable chemistry.

Name: Those Lips, Those Eyes

Name: Modern Girls
Description: A pair of women decide to prank their roommate's nerdy blind date after she stands him up, but end up developing a friendship with him after their practical joke sends them on an all-night odyssey through the 1980s club scene.

Name: Desk Set

Name: Snow Cake

Name: 40 Guns to Apache Pass
Description: The Apaches are on the warpath and the Army must defend them. Murphy's mission is to get a shipment of rifles, but it's stolen by greedy white traders with the help of mutinous soldiers.

Name: Bliss
Description: A mind-bending love story following Greg who, after recently being divorced and then fired, meets the mysterious Isabel, a woman living on the streets and convinced that the polluted, broken world around them is a computer simulat...

Name: The Opposite of Sex
Description: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

Name: Hindle Wakes
Description: 1952. Drama starring Leslie Dwyer and Lisa Daniely. Successful remake of one of the earliest British talkies. Set in the Hindle, two mill workers take off to Blackpool for the 'Wakes' holiday.

Name: Real Genius

Name: A Knight's Tale

Name: The Wood
Description: While dealing with a friend's cold feet on his wedding day, a writer reminisces about his youth with his best friends.

Name: Corrina, Corrina
Description: In 1959, a widower hires a kindly housekeeper/nanny to care for his seven-year-old daughter.

Name: Two Lovers and a Bear

Name: The Prince of Tides

Name: Fanfaren der Liebe

Name: Rent
Description: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.

Name: √Ödalen 31
Description: During a strike strike-breakers are being transported to Lunde, where they are assaulted by the strikers. The military are sent in. On the 14th May 1931 there is a confrontation between demonstrators and the military who open fire...

Name: Eva
Description: When Eva, a young housemaid, gets involved in a steamy threesome with a houseboy and her lady boss, she realizes she has to choose only one of them.

Name: Kleine Teun
Description: The wife of an illiterate farmer hires a beautiful woman to teach him how to read and write.

Name: Hotel for Women
Description: A girl from Syracuse goes to New York to see her boyfriend, successful architect who no longer cares for her. Fellow residents at a women's hotel encourage her to become a top model. When boyfriend tries to come back to her he has...

Name: Zelary
Description: A nurse is part of the resistance in 1940s Czech Republic. She is discovered and must find a place to hide. A patient whose life she saved, from a remote mountain village where time stopped 150 years ago, agrees to hide her as his...

Name: The Falls
Description: The Falls is a feature film about two missionaries that fall in love while on their mission.

Name: Fan chan
Description: Jeab hears that his childhood sweetheart Noi-Naa is to be married, so he makes the trip back home to his provincial village. As he does so, the memories come flooding back to his childhood in 1980s Thailand. He remembers always be...

Name: Somebody Up There Likes Me
Description: A comedy about a man, his best friend, and the woman they both adore watching their lives fly by.

Name: Jing goo juen ga
Description: A trickster-for-hire, known as the Tricky Expert, is hired to ruin the lives of a father and son by making them think that he's a part of the family.

Description: Hazel is a Protestant and Malachy a Catholic. Romance between them is threatened by Rohan, who wants Malachy to be recruited and fight for the cause, and by Hazel's brother Jef, who spies on her meetings.

Name: These Three
Description: Two schoolteachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie.

Name: Real Genius
Description: An uptight teenage prodigy enters a top engineering college, but feels awkward among the freewheeling students. When a professor aims to turn their laser project into a military weapon, he and his offbeat roommate plot to ruin the...

Name: The Kissing Booth
Description: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

Name: One Fine Morning
Description: With a father suffering from neurodegenerative disease, a young woman lives with her eight-year-old daughter. While struggling to secure a decent nursing home, she runs into an unavailable friend with whom she embarks on an affair.

Name: Roseanna's Grave
Description: Roseanna is dying of a heart condition, and all she wants is to be buried next to her daughter, in a cemetery that is getting full fast. The cemetery can't expand because Capestro, the man who owns the land next to the cemetery, w...

Name: Doctor Zhivago

Name: Romance
Description: Frustrated by the lack of intimacy in her relationship, a young schoolteacher goes through a series of intimidating and often violent sexual partners.

Name: Miss March
Description: Eugene believes in no sex before marriage. So DID his girlfriend, Cindi. His BFF loves sex. At Senior Prom, just before sex with Cindi, he falls into a coma. Waking up 4 years later, his Cindi is Miss March in Playboy. Can he get her back?

Name: Three Colors: Red

Name: The Body Disappears
Description: Comedy about an invisible man.

Name: Harold and Maude
Description: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

Description: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.

Name: Lamhe
Description: When the young Viren comes to India for the first time, he is captivated by Pallavi. When he learns she is already spoken for, he returns to London a broken man. When he gets the news of Pallavi and her husband dying and leaving t...

Name: Forget Paris
Description: A romantic new year's getaway to Paris descends into a nightmare when the couple's relationship implodes prior to their departure.

Name: Ano natsu, ichiban shizukana umi
Description: The lives of a young, hearing-impaired and gloomy couple are fulfilled after the boy holds interest in surfboarding.

Name: Aradhana
Description: Arun meets Vandana during a vacation and very soon they secretly get married. Arun is an Air Force pilot and dies in a crash, leaving pregnant Vandana heartbroken--and unable to prove that she is a married mother-to-be. As her mar...

Name: Starter for 10

Name: My Policeman
Description: The arrival of Patrick into Marion and Tom's home triggers the exploration of seismic events from 40 years previously.

Name: F.T.W.

Name: Buffalo '66

Name: Malizia
Description: A widower and two of his sons become infatuated with their beautiful housekeeper, and all three set out to seduce her using their own unique methods.

Name: Someone Great

Name: Far North

Name: Mr. Deeds

Name: Tangled

Name: J'me sens pas belle
Description: Fanny, a single woman in her mid-thirties, has had enough of relationships that don't work, so she decides to seduce Paul, a colleague from the office, into a brief one-night sexual encounter. Everything is prepared when Paul arri...

Name: Malena
Description: Amidst the war climate, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Mal√®na, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.

Name: Buccaneer's Girl
Description: A New Orleans entertainer falls for a pirate who has another identity.

Name: Jersey Girl
Description: A widower must look after his precocious daughter and rebuild his life and career after he's sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup.

Name: Romeo + Juliet

Name: The Decoy Bride

Name: After We Collided

Name: A Single Man
Description: An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles.

Name: The Longest Ride

Name: Smoke Lightning
Description: After Smoke wins the Blake ranch in a poker game, Blake commits suicide and Smoke deeds the ranch to Blake's young daughter. But the Sheriff is after the ranch and has Smoke arrested for the murder of Blake and then brings in an i...

Name: Carry on Henry
Description: After having just wed Marie of Normandy, Henry VIII's eager to consummate their marriage. Unfortunately, she's always eating garlic, and refuses to stop. Deciding to get rid of her - in his usual manner, Henry must find some way o...

Name: Crush
Description: An aspiring young artist joins her high school track team and later discovers what real love feels like when she finds herself falling for an unexpected teammate.

Name: Jane Eyre
Description: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

Name: Supernova

Description: Michelle and Allen are in a relationship. They decide to invite their parents to finally meet about marriage. Turns out, the parents already know one another well, which leads to some differing opinions about marriage.

Name: Dangerous Beauty
Description: A Venetian courtesan becomes a hero to her city, but later becomes the target of an inquisition by the Church for witchcraft.

Name: Father of the Bride
Description: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

Name: Machine Gun Mama
Description: Ollie and John are stuck with car trouble. Luckily they have Bunny the elephant. They try to sell him to a fair in financial trouble.

Name: Warm Bodies
Description: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

Name: Indianapolis Speedway
Description: Joe is the three-time Indy champion who still races to put young Eddie through college. Joe wants a better life for Eddie, and he explodes when he finds out that Eddie quit school for a racing career. Joe tries to teach Eddie the ...

Name: If It's Tuesday, This Must Be Belgium
Description: The humorous adventures of a group of American tourists taking an 18-day guided bus tour of nine European countries.

Name: Atlantic City
Description: In a corrupt city, a small-time gangster and the estranged wife of a pot dealer find themselves thrown together in an escapade of love, money, drugs and danger.

Name: Hero at Large

Name: A Stranger Among Us

Name: Dog Days

Name: Vanilla Sky

Name: Bad Teacher

Name: The Way We Were
Description: During pre-WWII McCarthyism, a diametrically opposed couple come together only to find out that genuine friendship and physical attraction is not enough to overcome fundamental societal beliefs.

Name: Cocktail
Description: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

Name: Doc Hollywood

Name: La femme de l'aviateur
Description: A young student is devastated when he finds that his girlfriend is cheating on him. In order to find out why she did it, he decides to spy on her and her lover.

Name: As Good as It Gets

Name: Stage Struck
Description: Broadway dance director George Randall (Dick Powell) is stuck with staging a Broadway show starring Peggy Revere (Joan Blondell), a wealthy but untalented performer who is starring only because she is backing the show. Tempers fla...

Name: What Dreams May Come
Description: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

Name: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps

Name: Cannon for Cordoba
Description: In 1916, when a Mexican rebel steals cannons from the American army, General Pershing sends out a group of misfits to retrieve the stolen weapons.

Name: Blonde Ambition

Name: Fascinating Youth
Description: Playboy Teddy Ward wants to marry artist Jeannie King; his father wants him to marry Loris Lane, but tells him he can marry his choice if he can make the Mountain Inn a profitable operation. Teddy agrees, and with his friends' sup...

Name: A Walk with Love and Death
Description: In a story set during the Hundred Years War, a student who has abandoned his studies in Paris, pairs with a young noblewoman with whom he has fallen in love.

Name: Along Came Polly
Description: A buttoned-up newlywed finds his strictly organized life descend into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

Name: La boum
Description: This is the story about a teenage girl's first love experiences.

Name: The Waterdance
Description: A young man learns how to come to terms with his disability after becoming paralyzed in a hiking accident.

Name: Judas Kiss
Description: A quirk in time and space gives a failed filmmaker the chance to reshape his destiny when he visits his peculiar alma mater.

Name: On the Town

Name: Splash

Name: Frances Ha

Name: Lyubov i golubi
Description: Injured on the job Vasily Kuzyakin gets a ticket to the resort. There he meets femme fatale Raisa Zakharovna, and once under the charm, moves to live with her. Unfortunately, a new life is not all that sweet as dreamed hapless Vas...

Name: The Innocent

Name: Hero Hiralal

Name: Hancock

Name: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald

Name: Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy

Name: Injustice

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

Name: Vibes

Name: Ba bai

Name: The Professionals

Name: Men of the Fighting Lady
Description: A famous writer visits an aircraft carrier during the Korean war to learn more about it and the way it's run. He also gets to find out more about the Navy and Marine aviators themselves, their internal and external conflicts and d...

Name: F9

Name: Escape from Sobibor

Name: Yukon Vengeance
Description: After three mail carriers have been killed and robbed of lumber camp payroll money, Corporal Rod Webb of the Canadian Mounties, is sent to Bear Creek. The body of each mail carrier who had been slain had been mauled by a huge bear...

Name: The Great Love
Description: An idealistic young American during World War I, itching to fight the Germans and not wanting to wait until the U. S. joined the war, journeys to Canada and enlists in the British army. He is sent for training to England, and then...

Name: Wreck-It Ralph
Description: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

Name: Orpheus' Song
Description: Two best friends from Berlin win a trip to Greece. On their excursion, they get lost on an island. They spend the night together in a cave and dream a mystical dream. On the next day, nothing between the two will be like it was be...

Name: Tang ren jie tan an 3

Name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 4

Name: The Amateur Gentleman
Description: A former boxing champion, now an innkeeper, is accused of stealing a watch from a party of guests at his inn who happen to be members of English royalty. The old man is arrested and thrown in prison. His son, knowing that his fath...

Name: Samarasimha Reddy
Description: Revenge story between Samarasimha Reddy and Veera Raghava Reddy.

Name: Colorado Territory

Name: The Odd Couple II

Name: Gudachari 117
Description: The film begins, 4 scientists come up with a nugget of creating a powerful satellite, who are kidnapped by a terrorist organization. The rest of the story revolves around the protection of scientists and restoring the satellite by...

Name: Aliens in the Attic
Description: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

Name: The Newton Boys
Description: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, owing to their good planning and minimal violence.

Name: The Spy Next Door
Description: Former C.I.A. spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

Name: The Tuttles of Tahiti
Description: After a long absence from the island, Chester Tuttle returns to Tahiti to find that little has changed. His large family, particularly his scheming Uncle Jonas, would rather dance and romance than earn a living. When Jonas loses t...

Name: Point Blank
Description: An ER nurse and a career criminal are forced into an unlikely partnership in taking down a ring of corrupt cops threatening the lives of both their families.

Name: Helen of Troy
Description: The Iliad's story of the Trojan war, told from the Trojan viewpoint.

Name: Star Trek: Insurrection
Description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

Name: American Ninja 2: The Confrontation
Description: On a remote Caribbean island, Army Ranger Joe Armstrong investigates the disappearance of several marines, which leads him to The Lion, a super-criminal who has kidnapped a local scientist and mass-produced an army of mutant Ninja...

Name: Lethal Weapon 2
Description: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

Name: The Monkey King: The Legend Begins
Description: The Monkey King: The Legend Begins is the re-imagined version by Hollywood of the film The Monkey King: Havoc in Heavens Palace, the origin and birthplace of The Monkey King Story.

Name: Mo' Money
Description: A petty crook stalks a cute girl into an office building and is taken for a job applicant. Conning gets him the job. It's in the mail room of new credit cards. 2 superiors are worse crooks.

Name: Kamui gaiden
Description: The adventurous story of a fugitive ninja.

Name: Clash of the Wolves

Name: Suicide Battalion

Name: Thief
Description: An ace safe cracker wants to do one last big heist for the mob before going straight.

Name: Pale Rider
Description: A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

Name: Gor
Description: American professor Tarl Cabot is transported via a magical ring to planet Gor, where he must help an oppressed country overthrow its evil king and his barbarian henchmen.

Name: The Little Mermaid
Description: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Name: The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland
Description: The Care Bears and Alice set out to stop an evil wizard from taking over Wonderland.

Name: Epic
Description: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and evil is taking place. She bands together with a ragtag group of characters to save their world--and ours.

Name: Live and Let Die
Description: Bond tracks down monstrous Mr Big in Harlem. Big is importing priceless gold coins to finance Russian spy operations and captures Bond

Description: Atrocious serial killings on holidays in Gotham City send The World's Greatest Detective into action - confronting both organized crime and a unified front of classic DC Super-Villains - while attempting to stop the mysterious murderer.

Name: Man in the Wilderness

Name: Happy Feet
Description: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

Name: Harry Tracy, Desperado
Description: A charming but unscrupulous train robber courts capture and hanging when he falls in love with the daughter of a judge.

Name: Poketto monsut√¢: Sereb√Æ - Toki wo koeta deai
Description: Ash must stop a hunter who forces the mythical Pok√©mon Celebi to help him destroy a forest.

Name: The Three Musketeers
Description: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down-on-their-luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

Name: The Muppets

Name: The Square Peg

Name: Superman

Name: Maximum Ride
Description: A flock of winged children mount a rescue plan when wolf-boys abduct their youngest member and return her to the militarized institution that created them all.

Name: Sphinx
Description: Egyptologist Erica Baron finds more than she bargained for during her long-planned trip to The Land of the Pharoahs: murder, theft, betrayal, love, and a mummy's curse.

Name: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
Description: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: O Pr√≠ncipe dos Ladr√µes (1991) in particular.

Name: Taffin
Description: An Irish tough-guy debt collector is asked by his local community to help rid the town of developers bent on building a chemical plant on the outskirts of town. The developers are ruthless and have sent their heavies into town to ...

Name: Tian di ying xiong
Description: A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travel...

Name: Ron's Gone Wrong
Description: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally-connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship.

Name: Tale of the Mummy
Description: Centuries ago, under the sands of ancient Egypt, a Prince was buried and his tomb eternally cursed so that no man would ever again suffer from his evil ways. But hundreds of years later on a greedy search for treasure, a group of ...

Name: Vidocq
Description: Paris, 1830: Vidocq is killed by a mirror masked man. A thief turned investigator, he was working on a case of men killed by lightning. His biographer tries to solve the case.

Name: Santa Claus: The Movie
Description: The legend of Santa Claus is put in jeopardy when an unscrupulous toy manufacturer attempts to take over Christmas.

Name: Gulliver's Travels
Description: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda but ends up on the island of Lilliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

Name: Swashbuckler

Name: The Presidio

Name: Thomas and the Magic Railroad

Name: Anastasia

Name: La guerre dans le Haut Pays
Description: In the winter of 1797-98, the troops of Napoleon and their revolutionary allies in the Pays de Vaud occupy the latter and begin preparations for a military offensive which will hasten the fall of Berne. On the far side of the snow...

After he receives a map from a dying pirate, he embarks on an odyssey across the universe to find the legendary Treasure Planet.

King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

Soon, two children, Tommy and Annika, venture into the house only to meet up with Pippi. The three soon become frien... Read all

Description: After witnessing the murder of an American diplomat, a beautiful gypsy woman, Katrina, becomes the assassins' next target. Harry Noble, senior security officer, wants to personally conduct the investigation and is devastated to le...

Name: Arthur et la vengeance de Maltazard
Description: Arthur answers a distress call from Princess Selenia, who is menaced by the nefarious Maltazard.

Name: Baai ga jai

Name: Fast Getaway
Description: A lighthearted tale about a gang of bank robbers who fall out and split up. The brains of the gang is a boy who, with his father, successfully continue their crime spree. Annoyed at this, Lilly and her loyal and stupid companion, ...

Description: The Snake Eaters are an elite division of the Marines especially trained for search and destroy missions. This actioner chronicles the exploits of one of them who has become a cop. Known as a tough loner, he returns to find the ba...

Description: In the not so distant future, society is controlled by the powerful State and a dictator known as the Director. Condor works as a hitman for the State, but a reunion with someone he thought was dead forces him to consider who his ...

Name: Will Penny
Description: Aging cowboy Will Penny gets a line camp job on a large cattle spread and finds his isolated cabin is already occupied by an abandoned woman traveler and her young son.

Name: Major Payne
Description: A recently discharged Major finds himself commanding a group of mismatched Cadets.

Name: Powwow Highway

Name: Labyrinth

Name: The Addams Family 2
Description: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters. Sequel to the 2019 animated film, 'The Addams Family'.

Name: How to Train Your Dragon
Description: Follows a young Viking as he aspires to hunt dragons, and how he becomes unexpectedly a friend of a young dragon.

Name: An American Tail: The Mystery of the Night Monster
Description: Fievel and other mice haunt the monster, with the result they want to track him down.

Name: The BFG
Description: An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

Name: Tarzan
Description: Tarzan and Jane Porter face a mercenary army dispatched by the evil CEO of Greystoke Energies, a man who took over the company from Tarzan's parents, after they died in a helicopter crash.

Name: The Incredible Hulk
Description: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

Name: The Revenant

Name: Il commissario di ferro

Name: Terror on the Prairie
Description: On the Montana plains, a frontier woman must protect herself against a ruthless gang of outlaws hell-bent on revenge.

Name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo

Name: Lonely Are the Brave
Description: A fiercely independent cowboy gets himself locked up in prison to escape with an old friend.

Name: Brother Bear

Name: A Better Way to Die

Name: The Princess and the Goblin

Name: Murder Mystery 2

Name: Love in Country
Description: It's 1968, and Vietnam War Army Sergeants Ian Alexander and John Reese heroically lead their squad in a desperate attempt to survive and complete a CIA Phoenix mission after their platoon was overrun by NVA forces. Just prior to t...

Name: Donovan's Reef
Description: In an ideal society on a picturesque South Sea island, people of several races and backgrounds live together in harmony. John Wayne is a WWII hero, who worked hard to own a shipping company and finds his true love. She is as stron...

Name: Peter Rabbit
Description: A rebellious rabbit tries to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

Name: Pocahontas
Description: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

Name: War Path
Description: A contract killer accepts a dangerous job that goes badly wrong, putting his wife's life in danger.

Name: Underworld

Name: The Powerpuff Girls Movie

Name: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane

Name: Crocodile Dundee II

Name: The Mission

Name: The Secret Life of Pets

Name: The Quick and the Dead
Description: In 1944 a patrol of American soldiers, after having been driven off their observation post by German troops, tries to make it back through enemy-occupied territory to the safety of their own lines with a partisan girls, and with t...

Name: Tremors II: Aftershocks
Description: Earl Bassett, now a washed-up ex-celebrity, is hired by a Mexican oil company to eradicate a Graboid epidemic that's killing more people each day. However, the humans aren't the only one with a new battle plan.

Name: House of Cards
Description: An elite firm of assassins must face their own mortality as they are hunted down one by one by a mysterious assailant. Caught up in the drama is a disgraced journalist who is more connected to the assassins' world than he could ev...

Name: The BFG

Name: Pinocchio
Description: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

Name: North to Alaska
Description: During the Alaska gold rush, prospector George sends partner Sam to Seattle to bring his fianc√©e but when it turns out that she married another man, Sam returns with a pretty substitute, the hostess of the Henhouse dance hall.

Name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Description: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

Name: El robo del siglo
Description: In 2006, a group of thieves performed what is considered one of the most famous and smart bank heists in the history of Argentina when they rob the Banco R√≠o branch in Acassuso.

Name: Hot Lead and Cold Feet
Description: This saga of the old west involves twin brothers who compete for possession of a rickety cow town founded by their father while a crooked Mayor tries to put an end to the competitors so he can inherit the town himself.

Name: Una pistola per Ringo
Description: An 'angel-faced' gunfighter is tasked with infiltrating a ranch overrun by Mexican bandits and saving their hostages, including the fianc√©e of the local sheriff.

Name: West of the Pecos
Description: Heading west for his health, Colonel Lambeth takes his daughter Rill along. Lost on the desert they are saved by Pecos and Chito. The Colonel hires the two and the Lambeths soon find themselves mixed up in Pecos' trouble. Pecos ha...

Name: The Texans
Description: After the Civil War, an ex-Confederate soldier faces new battles, including the elements and a carpetbagger intent on destroying him.

Name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Description: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

Name: The Boss Baby 2: Family Business

Name: The Next Big Hit

Name: Theodore Rex

Name: Chicken Run

Name: Do ma daan
Description: The movie is set in chaotic 1920's China, when warlords fought each other for power while Sun Yat-Sen's underground movement tried to establish a democratic republic. The movie tells the story of three young women and two young me...

Name: Knockin' on Heaven's Door

Name: Company Business

Name: Cast Away
Description: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

Name: Sergeant Ryker
Description: During the Korean War Sergeant Paul Ryker is accused of defecting to Communist China and then returning to his unit as a spy. He's court-martialed and sentenced to death but his attorney believes Ryker's innocent and asks for a ne...

Name: Darby O'Gill and the Little People
Description: A wily old codger matches wits with the King of the Leprechauns and helps play matchmaker for his daughter and the strapping lad who has replaced him as caretaker.

Name: The Phantom Empire
Description: When a man-eating cave creature appears with a fortune in uncut diamonds around his neck, Dr. Chambers' daughter Denae hires adventurers C & C Salvage to find the underground source of the gems. Accompanied by archeaological inter...

Name: Showtime

Name: Jingle All the Way

Name: Friday Night Lights

Name: Orders to Kill

Name: Dolittle
Description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

Name: Necromancer 2020
Description: Win is the only survivor from a black magic attack that has taken away his father's sacred amulet. When he come back for revenge with a powerful sorcery, he is faced with a new powerful cult that help people to be wealthy but hide...

Name: Highlander II: The Quickening
Description: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

Name: McBain
Description: A former Vietnam War lieutenant reforms his old team in order to help a revolutionary's sister overthrow a ruthless dictator.

Name: Jungle Goddess
Description: When a plane carrying the daughter of a millionaire crashes in an African jungle, two pilots set out to collect the reward. They discover that she has become the goddess of a primitive tribe. An insurgent witch doctor and fierce w...

Name: Tangier Incident
Description: Steve Gordon, an American agent posing as a black market operator, is in Tangier on a mission to stop the plans of three atomic scientists who are there to pool their secrets and sell them in a package to the Communists.

Name: Planes

Name: Las fuerzas vivas

Name: Bullets Over Brownsville

Name: Spirit Untamed

Name: The Sword in the Stone

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog

Name: Fly Away Home

Name: Dumbo
Description: A young elephant, whose oversized ears enable him to fly, helps save a struggling circus, but when the circus plans a new venture, Dumbo and his friends discover dark secrets beneath its shiny veneer.

Name: Big Hero 6

Name: Freddie as F.R.O.7.

Name: The Wraith Within

Name: Balto
Description: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

Name: The Lego Batman Movie

Name: The Next Three Days

Name: Lost in Space
Description: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

Name: The Adventures of Robin Hood

Name: Firepower
Description: In the near future, street gangs have their own city zones where cops can't go. Two tough cops are sent undercover in one of them to investigate an illegal cure for AIDS. But they must first fight in a deathmatch, and the match is...

Name: Stone Cold

Name: The Three Musketeers
Description: Joined by an eager recruit to protect the King of France, three loyal swordsmen attempt to defeat an evil royal advisor and a seductive envoy plotting to overthrow the crown.

Name: Asterix & Obelix: The Middle Kingdom

Name: Garfield

Name: Underdog

Name: Despicable Me 2
Description: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

Name: Vivo

Name: Cold Steel
Description: On his deathbed Steele Weir's father tells his son of a band of criminals who framed him for murder and robbed him of valuable land in the West. Under contract to build a dam, Steele goes to the headquarters of the gang; and becom...

Name: Rio Bravo
Description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Name: RV
Description: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

Name: Arthur and the Invisibles

Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III

Name: Going Bananas
Description: While on vacation in a fictitious African country, the young son of a US senator, his guardian and their guide must stop the corrupt local police chief and the shady owner of a local circus from capturing their new friend - a talk...

Name: Vidhaata
Description: When Kunal decides to avenge Abu Baba's death, he discovers his grandfather's true identity and the reason behind his father's death.

Name: The Battle of the River Plate

Name: The Parent Trap

Name: DragonHeart
Description: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.

Name: Odette

Name: Meet Dave
Description: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

Name: Alien¬≥
Description: Returning from LV-426, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on the maximum-security prison Fiorina 161, where she discovers that she has unwittingly brought along an unwelcome visitor.

Name: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
Description: Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.

Name: Torpedo Run
Description: A submarine commander is forced to blow up a Japanese ship with prisoners.

Name: Two-Bits & Pepper
Description: When bumbling look-alike criminal brothers Zike and Spider, kidnap best friends Katie and Tyler, the two girls must use their smarts and few booby traps to try and escape their captors. But not without the help from a pony named T...

Name: FernGully 2: The Magical Rescue
Description: The fairies of FernGully must venture outside the rain forest to rescue several young animals who were captured by poachers.

Name: Home Alone 3

Name: Ying hung boon sik
Description: A reforming ex-gangster tries to reconcile with his estranged policeman brother, but the ties to his former gang are difficult to break.

Name: Sidekicks
Description: A bullied teen who fantasizes about being Chuck Norris' sidekick trains in martial arts to fulfill his dreams.

Name: If It's Tuesday, This Must Be Belgium
Description: The humorous adventures of a group of American tourists taking an 18-day guided bus tour of nine European countries.

Name: Trzecia czesc nocy
Description: Set during the occupation of Poland during World War II. Some German soldiers, slaughter a woman, her son and mother-in-law. The husband and his father escape by being in the forest. The young man decides to join the resistance bu...

Name: Gunsmoke
Description: A young gunslinger tries to help a rancher and his daughter save their land and cattle from an evil, wealthy land owner.

Name: George of the Jungle
Description: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

Name: Lock Up

Name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock

Name: Shotgun Wedding

Name: The Little Vampire
Description: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

Name: The Angry Birds Movie 2
Description: The flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their feud to the next level.

Name: Hotel Imperial
Description: It is the fate of a small frontier town, adjoining the no-man's-land where the Russians and Austrians are fighting out one of the final campaigns of World War I, to be occupied one day by the Russians, the next by the Austrians, a...

Name: Mr. Nanny
Description: A former professional wrestler is hired to be the bodyguard/nanny for a couple of bratty kids whose inventor father is being stalked by a rival.

Name: Alien Nation
Description: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

Name: A Goofy Movie

Name: An Innocent Man

Name: Extreme Justice
Description: A rogue cop joins an elite L.A.P.D. unit who secretly operate as a vigilante death squad, but soon begins to question their methods.

Name: In the Army Now

Name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace

Name: Malone

Name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home

Name: ParaNorman

Name: The Lord of the Rings
Description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

Name: Tom and Jerry
Description: A chaotic battle ensues between Jerry Mouse, who has taken refuge in the Royal Gate Hotel, and Tom Cat, who is hired to drive him away before the day of a big wedding arrives.

Name: Monster Hunter

Name: Saul fia

Name: This Means War

Name: Snow White

Name: How to Train Your Dragon

Name: Desperado

Name: Nicholas Nickleby

Name: Philadelphia Experiment II

Name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
