Description: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.

Name: Og√∫ y Mampato en Rapa Nui
Description: Mampato, a little boy with a time-travelling belt, goes with his caveman friend Og√∫ to the ancient land of Rapa Nui on Easter Island. There they will meet a little girl name Marama and discover the old traditions of the natives.

Name: Tangled
Description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Name: Paddington 3
Description: Plot undisclosed. The third installment of the Paddington films.

Name: Magic in the Water
Description: Two siblings find out about a mythical aquatic monster and try to a save a remote Canadian lake from being used as a dump site for toxic waste.

Name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Description: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

Name: Die unendliche Geschichte III: Rettung aus Phantasien

Name: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
Description: After her father's ship is carried off by a sudden storm, the spunky Pippi Longstocking is stranded with her horse, Alfonso, and monkey, Mr. Nilsson, and takes up residence in the old family home, which is thought by neighborhood children to be haunted. Soon, two children, Tommy and Annika, venture into the house only to meet up with Pippi. The three soon become frien... Read all

Name: Rango
Description: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

Name: Curly Sue
Description: A homeless man and his young companion, who survive by conning people, meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.

Name: The Adventures of Snow White and Rose Red
Description: Snow White, a kind girl with a passion for animals and books, is best friends with her sister, Rose Red, an outgoing girl with a curious spirit. They spend their days roaming the forest and playing pretend. But it's not long befor...

Name: Alice Through the Looking Glass
Description: Alice is appointed to save her beloved Mad Hatter from deadly grief by travelling back to the past, but this means fatally harming Time himself, the noble clockwork man with the device needed to save the Hatter's family from the Red Queen.

Name: 3 Ninjas: Knuckle Up
Description: Rocky, Colt and Tum Tum are back in an all new adventure everyone will fall for.

Name: Black Beauty
Description: When farmer Evan's mare has a fine son, he promises the black stallion to his son Joe. The youngster enjoy growing up as playmates. Alas, once the good squire is buried, his mean heir, who abuses animals, turns the screws on till ...

Name: The Chipmunk Adventure
Description: The Chipmunks compete with the Chipettes in a round the world race.

Name: Doug's 1st Movie
Description: Doug and his pal Skeeter set out to find the monster of Lucky Duck Lake.

Name: The Secret of Kells
Description: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
Description: Three musical chipmunks are discovered by an aspiring songwriter who wants to use their amazing singing abilities to become famous.

Name: Benji the Hunted
Description: Benji is left in the wilderness after an accident. Can he survive?

Name: The Music Man
Description: Traveling con artist Harold Hill targets the na√Øve residents of a small town in 1910s Iowa by posing as a boys' band leader to raise money before he can skip town.

Name: Quest for Camelot
Description: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

Name: Trouble
Description: A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world, while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children.

Name: Tall Tale
Description: A young boy's imagination summons cowboy legend Pecos Bill, who helps him save the family farm from a greedy land-grabber. With the help of a lumberjack and a railroad worker, they all embark on a surprise-filled adventure.

Name: Eggs
Description: When the Take-its steal this year's supply of Easter Eggs, an unlikely group of characters band together and brave the perils of taking back what is rightfully theirs. These richly defined characters form deep bonds of friendship ...

Name: The Transformers: The Movie

Name: PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie

Name: Explorers

Name: An Extremely Goofy Movie

Name: The Powerpuff Girls Movie

Name: The Deadly Mantis

Name: Phar Lap

Name: The King of Kings

Name: Playing with Fire

Name: Raya and the Last Dragon
Description: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

Name: D.A.R.Y.L.
Description: A seemingly normal young boy is found abandoned on a mountain road and adopted by a family who are increasingly amazed by his abilities before discovering the secret behind his real identity.

Name: The Flight of Dragons

Name: Affair with a Stranger
Description: When a TV gossip columnist wrongly announces that the marriage between now successful playwright William Blakeley and his wife Carolyn is breaking up, New York friends variously reminisce about how the two met and married.

Name: Kamilla og tyven
Description: Orphan Kamilla moves in with her rich uncle who lives in Kristiansand, Norway in the early 1900, Norway. Her uncles wife however does not approve of Kamilla and want to send her to a boarding school in Denmark. Her uncle instead d...

Name: Dancing in the Rain
Description: An autism spectrum boy starts a beautiful friendship with each other. When they all grew up, a tragic event occurs, putting their friendship on the edge of destruction.

Name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

Name: Mighty Joe Young
Description: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzi...

Name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
Description: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

Name: The Watcher in the Woods
Description: When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.

Name: Rise of the Guardians

Name: The Rescuers

Name: The Boss Baby 2: Family Business
Description: The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business.

Name: Les 12 travaux d'Ast√©rix
Description: A group of indomitable Gauls are challenged by Roman Emperor Julius Caesar to accomplish twelve impossible tasks.

Name: Rang-e khoda
Description: The story of Mohammed, a blind Iranian boy and his father, Hashem, who is always oscillating between accepting his son as he is and abandoning him, as he represents a burden for him, after the loss of his wife.

Name: Sister Act 3: Kicking the Habit

Name: Daddy's Home

Name: Sylvester
Description: Charlie is a 16-year-old orphan struggling to raise her two younger brothers when she endeavors to train a rogue horse she names Sylvester and turn him into an eventing champion.

Name: Lady and the Tramp
Description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

Name: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
Description: The girls of St. Trinians are on the hunt for buried treasure after discovering headmistress Miss Fritton is related to a famous pirate.

Name: Minecraft

Name: Blank Check
Description: After a bike accident, a young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters it belongs to are in pursuit.

Name: Resident Evil: Degeneration

Name: The NeverEnding Story II: The Next Chapter

Name: Happy Feet
Description: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

Name: St. Trinian's
Description: In order to save their bankrupt school, a group of troublesome girls stage a robbery with a group of geniuses on their backs

Name: Redline
Description: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.

Name: Furry Vengeance
Description: In the Oregon wilderness, a real-estate developer's new housing subdivision faces a unique group of protestors: local woodland creatures who don't want their homes disturbed.
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

Name: Gake no ue no Ponyo
Description: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

Name: Tom Thumb
Description: A boy (Russ Tamblyn), no bigger than a thumb, manages to outwit two thieves (Terry-Thomas and Peter Sellers) determined to make a fortune from him.

Name: Nanny McPhee
Description: A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

Name: Disenchanted
Description: Fifteen years after her happily ever after, Giselle questions her happiness, inadvertently turning the lives of those in the real world and Andalasia upside down in the process.

Name: The Garden of Words
Description: A 15-year-old boy and 27-year-old woman find an unlikely friendship one rainy day in the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.

Name: A Wrinkle in Time
Description: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

Name: Identity Crisis
Description: It follows a college science genius who figures out how to clone herself.

Name: Buzz Lightyear of Star Command: The Adventure Begins

Name: Jungle 2 Jungle

Name: Belle et S√©bastien, l'aventure continue
Description: Ten-year-old orphan boy Sebastian lives with his faithful mountain dog Belle in a secluded alpine village with his grandfather, C√©sar. He receives word that his aunt Angelina's plane has crashed and he decides to search for her.

Name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Description: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

Name: Our Lips Are Sealed
Description: A family is relocated by FBI after the twin sisters stop a diamond thief with ketchup. They are blabbermouths so, as last chance, they end up in in Sydney, Australia. 2 mobsters are sent there for them and the hidden diamond.

Name: Sister Act

Name: Tomorrowland
Description: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

Name: D2: The Mighty Ducks

Name: C.H.O.M.P.S.
Description: A young man invents a robot dog that has super strength, x-ray vision and can detect crimes being committed. A greedy businessman tries to steal the invention from him.

Name: Animal Crackers
Description: A family must use a magical box of Animal Crackers to save a run-down circus from being taken over by their evil uncle Horatio P. Huntington.

Name: Khubsoorat
Description: A strict matriarch's regimented household is upended by the arrival of a spunky relative who challenges the rules.

Name: Missing Link
Description: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

Name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

Name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
Description: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

Name: Mary Poppins
Description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

Name: Don Quixote
Description: With his noble squire by his side, a retired country gentleman sets out on an adventure to right the wrongs of the world.

Name: Life with Father
Description: A straitlaced turn-of-the-century father presides over a family of boys and the mother who really rules the roost.

Name: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King
Description: In a world where magic is everything, Asta, a boy who was born with no magic, aims to become the "Wizard King," to overcome adversity, prove his power, and keep his oath with his friends.

Name: Night at the Museum

Name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame II

Name: Daddy Day Care
Description: Two men named Charlie Hinton and Phil Ryerson get laid off and have to become stay-at-home fathers when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day care center.

Name: Ladybug & Cat Noir: The Movie

Name: Wish

Name: The Wild
Description: An adolescent lion is accidentally shipped from the New York Zoo to Africa. Now running free, his zoo pals must put aside their differences to help bring him back.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim

Name: The Kid Who Would Be King
Description: A band of kids embark on an epic quest to thwart a medieval menace.

Name: Blue's Big City Adventure
Description: Josh and Blue head to New York City to audition for a big Broadway musical.

Name: Halloweentown II: Kalabar's Revenge

Name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
Description: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

Name: Running Free
Description: The tale of the extraordinary life and times of Lucky, a horse that was born in captivity but achieves his dream of running free with the help of a stableboy.

Name: Akira
Description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

Name: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
Description: A space alien is threatening to bring destruction on Earth, and the Power Rangers are enhanced with turbo powers in order to prevent her plan.

Name: The Journey of Natty Gann
Description: In the 1930s, a tomboy runs away from her guardian to join her single father who is 2,000 miles away, where he has found work.

Name: The Private War of Major Benson
Description: As a disciplinary measure, the Army transfers a heavy-handed Major to a ROTC academy where he must shape-up cadets and improve the school's overall ratings.

Name: The Cheetah Girls
Description: Four teens aim to take the world by storm with their music.

Name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Description: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

Name: The Adventures of the American Rabbit
Description: To fight evil, a young rabbit can transform into a star spangled superhero.

Name: Rip Girls
Description: A 13-year-old (Camilla Belle) learns to surf while visiting Hawaii for the first time to see a plantation she inherited.

Name: Die unendliche Geschichte
Description: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

Name: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
Description: A tug-of-war between Elmo and his friend sends his blanket to faraway Grouchland, a place full of grouchy creatures and the villainous Huxley. Elmo embarks on a rescue mission, learning important lessons about sharing and responsi...

Name: Alley Cats Strike
Description: A group of hip retro teenage outsiders become involved in an interschool bowling rivalry.

Name: Meet Dave
Description: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

Name: Sennen joy√ª
Description: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

Name: Treasure Planet
Description: In this science fiction rendering of the classic novel "Treasure Island", Jim Hawkins (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is a rebellious teen seen by the world as an aimless slacker. After he receives a map from a dying pirate, he embarks on an odyssey across the universe to find the legendary Treasure Planet.

Name: Inside Out
Description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

Name: Finding Dory
Description: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

Name: Bubble
Description: After bubbles that broke the laws of gravity rained down upon the world. Cut off from the outside world, Tokyo has become a playground for a group of young people who have lost their families.

Name: Pinocchio: A True Story

Name: Mortal Kombat Legends: Snow Blind
Description: As Kano and the Black Dragon wreak havoc around the globe, a young warrior named Kenshi will have to rise above his own limitations and take on the looming threat of Outworld.

Name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
Description: Manny, Sid and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny is not in fact the last of the woolly mammoths.

Description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Name: The Secret Life of Pets
Description: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

Name: Family Relations
Description: This documentary film is about Haji BABA with his children and their strange relations.

Name: 102 Dalmatians
Description: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

Name: Ella Enchanted
Description: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new stepfamily in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

Name: Buud Yam
Description: In an early 19th century African village, Wend Kuuni - a young man, lives with his adopted family after his mother was killed as a witch. When Pughneere - his adopted sister - becomes ill, the villagers suspect Wend Kuuni. In orde...

Name: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
Description: Eliza (Lacey Chabert) and Debbie (Danielle Harris) are two sisters who don't always get along. But their relationship is put to the test when Debbie's life is in danger, and Eliza might have to give up her power to talk to animals.

Name: Starchaser: The Legend of Orin
Description: Set on the subterranean Mine-World, a band of human worker are treated like slaves under the power of the evil overlord Zygon until one, Orin, unearths the hilt of a mythical sword that only he can master. Escaping the planet, he ...

Name: Descendants: The Rise of Red
Description: Follows Red, daughter of the Queen of Hearts, and Chloe, daughter of Cinderella, as they team up to save Auradon by traveling in back in time using the White Rabbit's pocket watch, to stop an event that would cause grave consequences.

Name: The Incredibles
Description: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

Name: Meet the Robinsons
Description: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

Name: Open Season

Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

Name: The Ghost and Mr. Chicken
Description: A timid typesetter hasn't a ghost of a chance of becoming a reporter - until he decides to solve a murder mystery and ends up spending a fright-filled night in a haunted house.

Name: Father of the Bride
Description: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

Name: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit

Name: Cool World
Description: When Jack Deebs was behind bars he found escape by creating Cool World, a cartoon series featuring a vixen named Holli Would. The flesh proves weaker than ink, however, as Holli takes human form in Las Vegas.

Name: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco

Name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh

Name: Kiki's Delivery Service

Name: Captain January

Name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs

Name: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
Description: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

Name: Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget
Description: Having pulled off an escape from Tweedy's farm, Ginger has found a peaceful island sanctuary for the whole flock. But back on the mainland the whole of chicken-kind faces a new threat, and Ginger and her team decide to break in.

Name: Billboard Dad
Description: Twin girls advertise their single father on a Santa Monica Billboard.

Name: Spirited Away: Live on Stage
Description: A young girl arriving in a new neighborhood, enters the world of spirits, and when her parents are turned into pigs she must go on a quest to rescue them.

Name: The Dark Crystal
Description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

Name: It's a Wonderful Life
Description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Name: Soul
Description: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

Name: Missing Link
Description: * (Dutch with English subtitles) FAMILY (2000) A young boy develops a passion for archeology and tries to unravel the truth about his ancestry.

Name: The King's Daughter
Description: King Louis XIV's quest for immortality leads him to capture and steal a mermaid's life force, a move that is further complicated by his illegitimate daughter's discovery of the creature.

Name: Mavka: The Forest Song
Description: Mavka must choose between love and duty to protect the Heart of the Forest.

Name: Samson and Delilah
Description: When strongman Samson rejects the love of the beautiful Philistine woman Delilah, she seeks vengeance that brings horrible consequences they both regret.

Name: Coco
Description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Name: Mr. Billion
Description: When an American billionaire dies, his poor Italian nephew inherits everything, provided he can arrive in the USA to claim his inheritance before the deadline but the corporate lawyer-executor tries to steal the inheritance.

Name: The Little Vampire
Description: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

Name: Pollyanna
Description: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

Name: The One and Only, Genuine, Original Family Band
Description: The eleven members of the Bower family move to Dakota Territory.

Name: Harry and the Hendersons
Description: The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep the legend of 'Bigfoot' a secret.

Name: Toy Story 2
Description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

Name: The Lego Ninjago Movie

Name: Magic Island
Description: A bored teenager receives a pirate adventure book from his nanny-housekeeper and is sucked into the magic story book after reading it.

Name: Moonrise Kingdom
Description: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

Name: Beowulf
Description: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel, who is terrorizing Denmark, then Grendel's Mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

Name: Kung Fu Panda 4
Description: Follow Po on his wide-eyed adventures in ancient China, whose love of kung fu is matched only by an insatiable appetite.

Name: Stuart Little 3: Call of the Wild
Description: The Little family spend their vacation near Lake Garland. Meanwhile, in the forest, a beast is threatening the animals to give her food every night.

Name: Greater
Description: The story of Brandon Burlsworth, possibly the greatest walk-on in the history of college football.

Name: Hook
Description: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

Name: Z-O-M-B-I-E-S 3
Description: Zed anticipates an athletic scholarship while Addison is gearing up for Seabrook's international cheer-off competition. Then suddenly, extraterrestrial beings appear around Seabrook, causing more than friendly competition.

Name: Wizards
Description: On a post-apocalyptic Earth, a wizard and his faire folk comrades fight an evil wizard who's using technology in his bid for conquest.

Name: Fiddler on the Roof
Description: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

Name: Little Eggs: An African Rescue
Description: Toto and his friends must rescue his egg children after they're taken away for a gourmet food event in Africa.

Name: Sgt. Stubby: An American Hero

Name: The Lorax
Description: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

Name: Despicable Me
Description: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

Name: Mighty Mouse in the Great Space Chase

Name: The Sandlot

Name: Shiloh

Name: If These Walls Could Talk #2 the Stage Play
Description: Well, the Walls Family is back at it again, and many things have taken place since the last gathering. What is Mother Mabel and her gang up to this time around?

Name: Pete's Dragon
Description: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.

Name: Bon Voyage, Charlie Brown (and Don't Come Back!!)

Name: A Matter of Time
Description: A broken heart consumes Nathan with bitterness, blinding him from the true love of his life and stifling all his dreams. Sometimes finding love and happiness is as simple as opening up your heart.

Name: Strays
Description: An abandoned dog teams up with other strays to get revenge on his former owner.

Name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
Description: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

Name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
Description: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

Name: Blizzard
Description: A young girl's aunt tells her the tale of a young ice skater and an enchanted reindeer.

Name: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
Description: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

Name: FairyTale: A True Story

Name: Astro Boy
Description: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him the greatest hero of his time.

Name: Blue's Big Musical Movie
Description: Blue and the gang decide to put on a musical show in the back yard.

Name: Goodbye
Description: A heartwarming story of the Bhalla family that depicts their journey of grief and self-discovery after they suffer the loss of their loved one.

Name: Bogus
Description: Recently orphaned, a young boy is taken in by his godmother who is shocked to realize that she can see the boy's imaginary friend: a flamboyant, French magician named Bogus.

Name: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure

Name: Marmaduke

Name: Flushed Away

Name: The Amazing Maurice

Name: Race to Witch Mountain

Name: A Simple Wish

Name: Howl's Moving Castle
Description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
Description: The world-famous singing preteen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

Name: Heathcliff: The Movie
Description: On a rainy day as Uncle Heathcliff is forced to babysit his nephews, and spends the time recounting his adventures, he meets a cat who looks just like him, one where he winds up working for a mob boss, one where his dad gets relea...

Name: A Fairy Tale After All
Description: A stubborn teenage girl finds herself confronted by whimsical characters when she is transported into a world of fantasy and fairy tales while attending a school marionette show.

Name: Betaab
Description: A young man (Sunny Deol) and woman (Amrita Singh) fall in love, but face obstacles from their families.

Name: Spice World
Description: World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Name: Namu, the Killer Whale

Name: Sleeping Beauty

Name: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation

Name: Coonskin

Name: Robotech: The Movie

Name: Now You See Him, Now You Don't

Name: An American Tail

Name: Koe no katachi

Name: Bolt

Name: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen

Name: Magic Camp

Name: Sherlock Gnomes

Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water

Name: Max Keeble's Big Move
Description: Max Keeble, the victim of his 7th grade class, plots revenge when he learns that he's moving, but it backfires when he isn't after all.

Name: The Apple Dumpling Gang
Description: Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California.

Name: The Muppets
Description: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

Name: The Land Before Time II: The Great Valley Adventure
Description: This time, while building a hideaway in their new home of the Great Valley, Littlefoot and the gang rescue a mysterious egg from two scheming egg-nappers and make a starling surprise - and new friend - when the egg hatches.

Name: Y√¥j√ª toshi
Description: While protecting a signatory to a peace treaty between their peoples, a male human and a female demon discover that their mutual attraction may be the key to unifying their worlds.

Name: Batman: The Killing Joke
Description: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

Name: The Wonderful World of the Brothers Grimm
Description: The story of Wilhelm and Jacob Grimm, and three of their stories.

Name: Pee-wee's Big Adventure
Description: When eccentric man-child Pee-wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

Name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days

Name: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
Description: Feature adaptation of the animated short film interviewing a mollusk named Marcel.

Name: Black Dog, Red Dog
Description: Follows the life of Stephen Dobyns as he deals with life, women, and his move from journalism to poetry.

Name: Puss in Boots
Description: An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend, and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor, and regain the trust of his mother and town.

Name: Mulan
Description: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

Name: My Little Pony: A New Generation
Description: After the time of the Mane 6, Sunny--a young Earth Pony--and her new Unicorn friend Izzy explore their world and strive to restore Harmony to Equestria.

Name: Charlotte's Web
Description: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

Name: Dada
Description: A couple in love, accidentally become teenage parents. Unpleasant situations make them fall apart. Manikandan, left alone with his son, struggles as a single teenage father. Fate owns him, bringing Sindhu back into his life.

Name: The Thief of Bagdad
Description: After being tricked and cast out of Bagdad by the evil Jaffar, King Ahmad joins forces with a thief named Abu to reclaim his throne, the city, and the Princess he loves.

Name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
Description: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

Name: The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain
Description: The first wedding anniversary of Princess Odette and Prince Derek is distracted by field fires set by Knuckles. His master Clavius, wants to conquer the world, and he needs to capture a giant orb to do that. Clavius kidnaps Queen ...

Name: Little Secrets
Description: A fourteen-year-old aspiring violinist finds herself under an increasing amount of pressure to keep secrets for herself, her family and her newfound best friend.

Name: The Princess Diaries
Description: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.

Name: Penguins of Madagascar

Name: Scrooge: A Christmas Carol
Description: A supernatural, time-travelling, musical adaptation of Charles Dickens's cult Christmas story.

Name: Stardust
Description: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

Name: The Swan Princess: A Royal Wedding
Description: Princess Odette and Prince Derek are going to a wedding at Princess Mei and her beloved Chen. But evil forces are at stake and the wedding plans are tarnished and true love has difficult conditions.

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
Description: Plot under wraps

Name: Hyper Sapien: People from Another Star
Description: Three aliens from the planet Taros land on Earth and are befriended by a Wyoming rancher's son.

Name: Blinky Bill: The Movie
Description: An adventurous young koala embarks on a journey across the wild and dangerous Australian outback in the hope of finding his missing father, but he soon discovers that there is more to being a hero than meets the eye.

Name: My Fair Lady
Description: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

Name: Wendell & Wild
Description: Two scheming demon brothers, Wendell and Wild, enlist the aid of 13-year-old Kat Elliot to summon them to the Land of the Living.

Name: The Boy from Mercury
Description: Harry is an eight-year-old boy growing up in Ireland with his dis-spirited widowed mother May and older brother Paul. He is bullied in school, and his only real friend is his dog Max. His great joy and obsession are the Flash Gord...

Name: Bugsy Malone
Description: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.

Name: A Little Princess
Description: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

Name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Description: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Name: Pooh's Heffalump Halloween Movie
Description: Lumpy teams with tiny Roo for a Halloween adventure in the Hundred Acre Wood, in this animated tale about friendship, bravery, and teamwork.

Name: What a Girl Wants
Description: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

Name: James and the Giant Peach
Description: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

Name: Hocus Pocus 2
Description: Two young women accidentally bring back the Sanderson Sisters to modern day Salem and must figure out how to stop the child-hungry witches from wreaking havoc on the world.

Name: A Shaun the Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
Description: When an alien with amazing powers crash-lands near Mossy Bottom Farm, Shaun the Sheep goes on a mission to shepherd the intergalactic visitor home before a sinister organization can capture her.

Name: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
Description: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

Name: J√ªb√™ ninp√ªch√¥
Description: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

Name: The Christmas Chronicles
Description: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

Name: Happy Feet Two
Description: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

Name: White Wilderness
Description: The wildlife of the arctic is explored in this true-life adventure.

Name: Aquamarine
Description: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

Name: The Emperor's New Groove
Description: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

Name: Au cas o√π je n'aurais pas la palme d'or
Description: Since his directorial debut 10 years ago, Simon, a forty something filmmaker, nowadays spends more time shooting the breeze than shooting films. Following a silly bet he makes with an actor friend, he shaves his head and discovers...

Name: Around the World in 80 Days
Description: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

Name: Calamity, une enfance de Martha Jane Cannary
Description: 1863, a convoy in the American West, Martha Jane needs to learn how to take care of horses to drive the family wagon. Except she ends up wearing pants and cutting her hair. The scandal that its stark character provokes will force ...

Name: 3 Ninjas
Description: Each year, three brothers visit their grandfather for the summer. He is highly skilled in ninjutsu, and for years he has trained the boys in his techniques.

Name: Wreck-It Ralph
Description: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

Name: PAW Patrol: The Movie
Description: Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos.

Name: Prancer Returns
Description: Preteen brothers from a broken marriage live with their mother, Denise, in a rural town. Ryan, the cheeky elder boy, wants to go live with their father, Matt, in Chicago. This confuses shy Charlie, the youngest, who is also the bu...

Name: Robin Hood
Description: The story of the legendary British outlaw portrayed with the characters as anthropomorphic animals.

Name: Dolittle
Description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

Name: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
Description: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

Name: Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse
Description: After leaving off from Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse, the story continues.

Name: Valiant
Description: At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon (Tim Curry) and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is h...

Name: Cars 3
Description: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

Name: Mighty Joe Young
Description: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzija) returns from the past to seek vengeance on Joe.

Name: Scooby-Doo
Description: After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.

Name: The Little Mermaid
Description: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

Name: A Bug's Life
Description: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

Name: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
Description: Thirty years after their popular television show ended, chipmunks Chip and Dale live very different lives. When a cast member from the original series mysteriously disappears, the pair must reunite to save their friend.

Name: Home on the Range
Description: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

Name: The Rescuers Down Under
Description: R.A.S. agents Miss Bianca and Bernard race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

Name: Into the West
Description: Grandpa Ward gives a horse he found to his grandchildren, who keep it in their tower-block flat in Dublin. The horse is stolen from them, and the two young boys set out to find it and flee on it.

Name: The Quest for Tom Sawyer's Gold
Description: A risk-averse English teacher is forced to face her greatest fears when several of her students venture alone into the southern wilderness in search of Tom Sawyer's long lost gold.

Name: The Jungle Book
Description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

Name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Description: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

Name: The Adventures of Panda Warrior
Description: A peace-loving soldier is transported to another world and turned into a panda. To get home, he must join forces with a flying pig to free the once-peaceful land from tyranny.

Name: It Takes Two
Description: Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

Name: Stand by Me Doraemon
Description: What will happen to Nobita's life after Doraemon leaves?

Name: Aladdin
Description: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

Name: Charlotte's Web 2: Wilbur's Great Adventure
Description: Wilbur the pig knows how important friendship is - he learned that from a spider named Charlotte. So when Wilbur meets Cardigan, a lonely lamb, Wilbur immediately makes him his friend. Wilbur shows Cardigan the joys of farm life, ...

Name: Turbo
Description: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

Name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Description: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

Name: Wish Dragon
Description: Determined teen Din is longing to reconnect with his childhood best friend when he meets a wish-granting dragon who shows him the magic of possibilities.

Name: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
Description: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

Name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
Description: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

Name: Popeye
Description: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

Name: The Witches
Description: A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.

Name: My Neighbor Totoro
Description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

Name: Titan A.E.
Description: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Name: Trolls
Description: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

Name: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
Description: In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.

Name: Lightyear
Description: While spending years attempting to return home, marooned Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear encounters an army of ruthless robots commanded by Zurg who are attempting to steal his fuel source.

Name: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
Description: Balthazar Blake, an apprentice of the legendary magician Merlin, must train his old teacher's successor - an introverted but resourceful physics prodigy - in the art of sorcery to prevent the return of Morgana le Fay.

Name: Batman: The Long Halloween

Name: Uchu kaij√ª Gamera
Description: Using several clips from previous Gamera entries, this film deals with alien forces sending all the monsters Gamera has faced in one final battle to rid the planet of its last hope.

Name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
Description: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

Name: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2

Name: Digimon: The Movie
Description: Throughout three different stories, Kari Kamiya and her friends take on explosive adventures involving digital creatures.

Name: Masters of the Universe
Description: He-Man, the most powerful man in the universe, goes against the evil Skeletor to save the planet Eternia and protect the secrets of Castle Grayskull.

Name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
Description: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

Name: Barnyard

Name: Gekij√¥-ban poketto monsutaa: Mizu no Miyako no Mamori Gami Ratiasu to Ratiosu

Name: Inside Out 2

Name: A Kid for Two Farthings
Description: In a lower-class London community of small shops, open-air vendors and flea-marketers, Joe, a small boy, lives with his mother, Joanne, who works in and rooms above the Kandinsky tailor shop. Joe is innocently and earnestly determ...

Name: Sky High
Description: Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

Name: Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang

Name: Miracles from Heaven

Name: The Witches

Name: Kubo and the Two Strings

Name: The Princess and the Goblin

Name: Simon Birch

Name: Fly Away Home

Name: Prom Pact
Description: Follows the main character, a feminist who doesn't believe in the idea of falling in love, especially in heteronormative love, but then she falls and there's undeniable chemistry.

Name: WALL¬∑E
Description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Name: Road to Utopia
Description: Two vaudeville flops pose as bad guys and join the Klondike gold rush with a saloon singer.

Name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers

Name: The Mitchells vs the Machines

Name: Arthur and the Invisibles

Name: Beethoven's 5th

Name: Madeline
Description: Horrified at the prospect of her beloved school being sold, a young French girl uses her wit and craftiness to attempt to save it, making an unlikely new friend in the process.

Name: Gallavants
Description: Gallavants are ants living in a their own fairy-tale land, Ganteville. The little ones have to go to school in preparation of their adult life as working ants. However, one pupil thinks he doesn't need to take lessons in order to ...

Name: It's a Very Merry Muppet Christmas Movie
Description: 'Twas the night before Christmas and the Muppet Theatre is in danger of being torn down, but with hilarious send-ups of just about every holiday movie ever made, the Muppets discover that what matters most is their love for each o...

Name: A Troll in Central Park
Description: An evil Queen banishes a flower loving troll named Stanley (Dom DeLuise) to New York City, where he befriends two young children.

Name: Rockin' with Judy Jetson
Description: There's intergalactic trouble when the lyrics Judy Jetson wrote for teen heartthrob Sky Rocker are swapped with a secret message from a music-hating witch. Now it's up to Judy, her family, and friends to save rock-and-roll.

Name: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb

Name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4
Description: One day a child goes to Freddy Fazbear's Pizza restaurant. The next day strange things start to happen. A package arrives at his front door, an invitation to an anonymous birthday party. Things lurk around during the night at Freddy Fazbear's. The boy must somehow survive until the party; However, when and if he makes it to the party may be an unexpected

Name: Playmobil: The Movie
Description: When her younger brother Charlie unexpectedly disappears into the magical, animated universe of PLAYMOBIL¬Æ, unprepared Marla must go on a quest of a lifetime to bring him home, setting off on a fantastic journey across stunning new worlds.

Name: Slappy and the Stinkers
Description: a group of young troublemakers try to help a sea lion escape to ocean.

Name: Zootopia
Description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

Name: Porco Rosso

Name: Snow Day

Name: Cinderella II: Dreams Come True
Description: Jaq and Gus create a storybook based on three events that happened after the first film. The stories include Cinderella's opposition to the court's strict etiquette, Jaq's becoming human for a day, and Anastasia's redemption throu...

Name: Parental Guidance
Description: Artie and Diane agree to look after their three grandkids when their type-A helicopter parents need to leave town for work. Problems arise when the kids' 21st-century behavior collides with Artie and Diane's old-school methods.

Name: An American Tail: The Mystery of the Night Monster

Name: Tiny Toon Adventures: How I Spent My Vacation
Description: A re-edited version of Tiny Toon Adventures: How I Spent My Vacation made into four TV episodes and aired on Fox Kids.

Name: The BFG

Name: Good Burger 2
Description: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 1997 film 'Good Burger'.

Name: How Green Was My Valley

Name: And You Thought Your Parents Were Weird

Name: The Water Horse
Description: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

Name: One Piece: Stampede
Description: Pirates from around the world gather at the Pirates Expo to join the hunt for Gol D. Roger's lost treasure.

Name: Ferdinand
Description: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

Name: Air Bud 3: World Pup

Name: Skippy
Description: A half-wit falls in love with a beautiful movie star.

Name: Finding Nemo
Description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Name: Snow Day
Description: When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.

Name: The Santa Clause 2

Name: Garfield
Description: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

Name: A Cinderella Story

Name: The Angry Birds Movie

Name: A Christmas Carol

Name: The BFG

Name: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid

Name: Tarzan

Name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties

Name: Earthbound

Name: Big Leaguer
Description: John Lobert runs a training camp in Florida for the New York Giants. Every year, he evaluates the hopefuls to pick the best for a minor league contract. They all have dreams and talent, but the elimination whittles them down to a ...

Name: It Happens Every Spring

Name: Easter Under Wraps
Description: Erin Cavendish goes undercover at her family's chocolate plant to see why sales are down when she meets head chocolatier, Bryan, who has new ideas on how to update the Easter product line.

Name: Mom and Dad Save the World

Name: The Great Locomotive Chase

Name: Yellow Submarine

Name: Stuart Little 2
Description: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

Name: Fantastic Voyage
Description: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his bloodstream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter it.

Name: The Brave Little Toaster

Name: Mr. Peabody & Sherman

Name: Weathering with You

Name: The Magician's Elephant

Name: The Mighty Ducks

Name: Mr. Nanny

Name: Tenk√ª no shiro Rapyuta
Description: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

Name: Enchanted
Description: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

Name: Kaze no tani no Naushika
Description: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausica√§ desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

Name: Dragonworld
Description: A young man must risk his life to save his fire-breathing friend from the unscrupulous owner of an amusement park.

Name: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters

Name: The Little Rascals

Name: The House with a Clock in Its Walls

Name: The Bob's Burgers Movie
Description: The Belchers try to save the restaurant from closing as a sinkhole forms in front of it, while the kids try to solve a mystery that could save their family's restaurant.

Name: S tebou me bav√≠ svet
Description: Three middle-aged men go for a vacation with their children and learn to cope with their needs without their wives. Quickly, they plan to exhaust the kids to have some time off, but nothing really works out as planned.

Name: Little Giants
Description: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

Name: Thumbelina

Name: The Amazing Mr. Blunden
Description: A mysterious, very old solicitor Mr. Blunden visits Mrs. Allen and her young children in her squalid, tiny Camden Town flat and makes her an offer she cannot refuse. The family become the housekeepers to a derelict country mansion...

Name: Les ma√Ætres du temps

Name: Ast√©rix & Ob√©lix: Mission Cl√©op√¢tre
Description: Ast√©rix and Ob√©lix go to Egypt to help architect Num√©robis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.

Name: Nancy Drew
Description: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.

Name: Wolfwalkers

Name: Stuart Little
Description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

Name: The Peanuts Movie

Name: Trolls World Tour

Name: The Golden Compass
Description: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

Name: Luca
Description: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

Name: Baduk
Description: Baduk is the name of the child who works in smuggling, due to poverty he and his sister separated, the sister will work as a maid, he keeps trying to reach his sister in vain, finally he escaped from Iran because he thinks that hi...

Name: The Secret Life of Pets 2
Description: Continuing the story of Max and his pet friends, following their secret lives after their owners leave them for work or school each day.

Name: Ele, My Friend
Description: In 1920s India, a young boy named Charles befriends a baby Indian elephant that he names Ele. Their friendship is tested when Charles must save his friend Ele from hunters.

Name: Short Circuit

Name: The Lone Ranger Rides Again
Description: Homesteaders are moving into the valley settled many years ago by rancher Craig Dolan. He wants to keep them out by legal means but his nephew Bart brings in outlaws to drive them out. The Lone Ranger is on hand to help the homest...

Name: Leprechaun 5: In the Hood
Description: When three rappers want to get even with a pimp, they accidentally unleash a leprechaun who goes on a killing rampage in tha 'hood.

Name: Lilies - Les feluettes

Name: Real Genius
Description: An uptight teenage prodigy enters a top engineering college, but feels awkward among the freewheeling students. When a professor aims to turn their laser project into a military weapon, he and his offbeat roommate plot to ruin the...

Name: The Man from Planet X
Description: As a mysterious planet hurls itself toward Earth, an enigmatic extraterrestrial scout arrives on a remote Scottish island with unknown intentions.

Name: The Legend of Zelda: The Hero of Time
Description: Link, after doubting his relation to the people of the Kokiri Forest leaves to find out his real heritage. But he is dragged into becoming the chosen to defeat the tyrannical Ganondorf and save Hyrule and the imprissoned Princess ...

Name: Dr Jekyll & Sister Hyde
Description: A Victorian scientist tests a serum that transforms him into a sensuous murderess.

Name: Akumul√°tor 1
Description: In this movie, TV sets are full of life. If a person is in TV (e.g. because it was filmed on the street) it has a double that's right in the TV set. This double needs energy from the true character to survive. Each time, the real ...

Name: About Time
Description: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

Name: Legion of Super-Heroes

Name: Etoile

Name: Slapstick (Of Another Kind)

Name: Maleficent
Description: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child may be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

Name: SpaceCamp
Description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

Name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
Description: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.

Name: Redline
Description: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.

Name: Fallen
Description: A young girl finds herself in a reform school after therapy since she was blamed for the death of a young boy. At the school she finds herself drawn to a fellow student, unaware that he is an angel, and has loved her for thousands of years.

Name: Firepower
Description: In the near future, street gangs have their own city zones where cops can't go. Two tough cops are sent undercover in one of them to investigate an illegal cure for AIDS. But they must first fight in a deathmatch, and the match is...

Name: Mighty Aphrodite
Description: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.

Name: And You Thought Your Parents Were Weird
Description: Two inventor brothers create a working robot that is also inhabited by the spirit of their dead father.

Name: The Tuxedo
Description: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

Description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

Name: Gin gwai

Description: A couple invites a Count from Hungary, who recently immigrated to America, to conduct a seance for the woman's recently deceased mother, oblivious to the fact that he is actually a vampire.

Name: Man van staal
Description: A romantic and funny coming-of-age story. Victor, a 13-year-old boy, is desperately looking for his First Kiss. When that First Kiss comes too close, Victor seeks refuge in his imagination, becoming the Man of Steel who has no emo...

Name: Monkeybone
Description: In a coma, a cartoonist finds himself trapped within his own underground creation and must find a way to get back, while racing against his popular but treacherous character, Monkeybone.

Name: The BFG
Description: An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

Name: Tri or√≠sky pro Popelku
Description: Life changes dramatically for a Czech housemaid when the chauffeur gives her three magical hazelnuts.

Name: La Danza de la Realidad
Description: In a little Chilean town, the son of an uprooted couple formed by a rigorous communist father and a loving but weak mother tries to pave his own path in a society that does not understand their Jewish-Ukrainian origins.

Name: The Cremators
Description: An alien life form that is a huge ball of living matter invades earth, and replenishes itself by absorbing people.

Name: Star Trek Into Darkness
Description: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

Name: Saturday the 14th
Description: A family inherits an old mansion which houses the dangerous 'Book of Evil' that has all the monsters of the world trapped inside it.

Name: Martians Go Home
Description: Song writer Mark Devereaux accidentally calls millions of green Martians to invade Earth. No they aren't dangerous, just wise-cracking, intrusive, pain in neck, annoyances. No one can escape their distracting influence. It's up to...

Name: Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight
Description: High-level demons collect low-level demons as warriors in attempt to obtain a key containing the blood of Christ. The key is guarded by immortal warriors called Demon Knights.

Name: Audrey Rose
Description: A stranger attempts to convince a happily married couple that their daughter is actually his daughter reincarnated.

Name: The Illusionist
Description: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

Name: Space Marines
Description: Space pirates, led by diabolical Colonel Fraser, take over a cargo ship carrying anti-matter explosive and an important official. Space marines, led by Captain Gray, must stop their evil plans.

Name: Shakma
Description: A group of medical students are attacked by an aggressive laboratory animal while competing in an after-hours role-playing game at their school.

Name: Nightbreed
Description: A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy.

Name: Another Earth
Description: On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

Name: Halloweentown II: Kalabar's Revenge
Description: A young witch and her grandmother work together to foil the plans of a wicked warlock's son before he can use powerful spells to create chaos in the world.

Name: The Girl in a Swing
Description: A London art broker goes to Copenhagen where he requires the services of a secretary fluent in Danish, English, and German. He falls deeply in love with the woman, despite the fact that he knows virtually nothing about her. She in...

Name: Repo Men
Description: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased. He must therefore go on the run before said ticker is repossessed.

Name: Beauty and the Beast
Description: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

Name: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
Description: Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials, unexpected allies, and dark new forces at play.

Name: Leprechaun 4: In Space

Name: Sleeping Beauty
Description: When a young Prince and his trusted aid learn of a beautiful Princess's cursed eternal slumber, they embark on a journey to rescue her. They must battle an evil queen and legions of undead monsters before she will be free.

Name: It's a Wonderful Life
Description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Name: Field of Dreams
Description: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

Name: Atomic Brain Invasion

Name: Beyond the Black Rainbow
Description: Despite being under heavy sedation, a young woman tries to make her way out of the Arboria Institute, a secluded, quasifuturistic commune.

Name: Impostor

Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2

Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1

Name: A Clockwork Orange

Name: Dementia 13

Name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief

Name: Wonder Man

Name: Country Gold

Name: Children of Men

Name: Earthbound

Name: Cronos
Description: A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

Name: Power Rangers
Description: When Earth is on the verge of an alien invasion, five teenagers, who are infused with superhuman abilities, must harness their newfound powers to battle this threat - as the Power Rangers.

Name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

Name: Disturbing Behavior

Name: A Midsummer Night's Dream

Name: I Married a Monster from Outer Space

Name: Humanoids from the Deep

Name: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea

Name: Magic Camp
Description: At the urging of his former mentor and Magic Camp owner Roy Preston, Andy returns as a counselor to the camp of his youth hoping to reignite his career.

Name: Breaking Infinity
Description: Liam is a scientific researcher who has been unstuck in time, as his jumps through time get more extreme, he is guided to the future by a mysterious old man where he witnesses the end of the world that he may have caused.

Name: Superman
Description: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

Name: Levitation
Description: Sarah Paulson stars as a pregnant teenager who searches for her biological mother, with the help of a guardian angel.

Name: A Matter of Life and Death

Name: Miracolo a Milano
Description: An open-hearted, unrelentingly energetic orphan struggles to make the best of his life on the streets of Milan.

Name: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
Description: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

Name: Er√©ndira
Description: While Erendira, a beautiful teenage girl, has a surreal mystical vision, her grandmother's house catches on fire and burns to the ground. Her grandmother holds Erendira responsible and, in order to extract restitution from the gir...

Name: Super 8
Description: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

Name: Day the World Ended
Description: In a post-Apocalyptic world after an atomic war seven disparate people find themselves in a protected valley in the home of a survivalist and his beautiful daughter.

Name: Robinson Crusoe on Mars
Description: Stranded on Mars with only a monkey as a companion, an astronaut must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet.

Name: Metropolis
Description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

Name: Vt√°ckovia, siroty a bl√°zni
Description: Three adolescent war orphans seclude themselves in an anarchic and playful existence of denial and juvenile joy.

Name: Invitation to the Dance
Description: Three different stories are told through a notably unusual way - no words, just dance.

Name: Northfork
Description: Set in 1955, the residents of a small Montana community are forced to move their homes to make way for a new dam.

Name: Pari
Description: Arnab tries to help Ruksahana, who is found under mysterious circumstances in a house. He lets her stay at his home until he discovers something strange about her.

Name: Alice Through the Looking Glass

Name: Splash
Description: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.

Name: Judge Dredd
Description: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

Name: PK
Description: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of there religious views on there people.

Name: Fire and Ice
Description: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.

Name: Sanatorium pod Klepsydra
Description: J√≥zef visits his dying father at a remote mental institution, where time itself doesn't seem to exist, and the line between dreams and memories becomes indistinguishable.

Name: Prancer Returns
Description: Preteen brothers from a broken marriage live with their mother, Denise, in a rural town. Ryan, the cheeky elder boy, wants to go live with their father, Matt, in Chicago. This confuses shy Charlie, the youngest, who is also the bu...

Name: Artemis Fowl
Description: Artemis Fowl, a young criminal prodigy, hunts down a secret society of fairies to find his missing father.

Name: The Day After Tomorrow
Description: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

Name: The Secret of Moonacre
Description: Maria inherits a book of secrets from her dad. She moves to her uncle's Moonacre estate. A family curse was cast on the valley. Only Maria can break it using her book.

Name: The Last Days on Mars

Name: There Goes the Neighborhood
Description: A quiet neighborhood prepares for the end of the world after a conspiracy theorist doomsday prepper moves in.

Name: Darby O'Gill and the Little People

Name: The Scorpion King

Name: Predator 2
Description: The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.

Name: Clash of the Titans
Description: Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth.

Name: I, Madman

Name: D.A.R.Y.L.

Name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 4

Name: Time Under Fire

Name: Carnosaur 2

Name: The Giver

Name: Alien Resurrection

Name: Gallavants
Description: Gallavants are ants living in a their own fairy-tale land, Ganteville. The little ones have to go to school in preparation of their adult life as working ants. However, one pupil thinks he doesn't need to take lessons in order to ...

Name: Dr. Who and the Daleks
Description: An eccentric inventor and his companions travel in his TARDIS to the Planet Skaro and battle the evil menace of the Daleks.

Name: Agency
Description: A millionaire is suspected of buying an ad agency to use it as a way of brainwashing the public for his political ends.

Name: Little
Description: A woman is transformed into her younger self at a point in her life when the pressures of adulthood become too much to bear.

Name: Knight of Cups

Name: The Adjustment Bureau

Name: Gojira vs. Biorante
Description: Desolate by the loss of his daughter, a geneticist creates a monstrous new mutation.

Name: Outland

Name: Immortals

Name: Urotsukidoji: Legend of the Overfiend

Name: Iceman

Name: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Movie
Description: Mike Nelson and his robot companions watch and give their comments about S.O.S. Metaluna (1955).

Name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

Name: Short Circuit
Description: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

Name: It's Alive III: Island of the Alive
Description: The mutant babies have been placed by court order on a deserted island. Appalled by the cycnicism and exploitation of the children by the legal system and the media, the man responsible for them leads an expedition to the island t...

Name: The Gate
Description: Kids left home alone accidentally unleash a horde of malevolent demons from a mysterious hole in their suburban backyard.

Name: Brain Dead
Description: In a showdown of man versus machine, Martin plunges into a chaotic nightmare trying to save his mind from the megalomaniacal corporation.

Name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park

Name: Let the Right One In
Description: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

Name: Ngo joh ngan gin do gwai
Description: A car accident gives a spoiled, troubled young woman the ability to see ghosts, including one of a former classmate.

Name: Radio Free Albemuth
Description: Sci-fi thriller from Philip K. Dick (Blade Runner, Minority Report, A Scanner Darkly); Nick Brady receives messages from space and joins conspiracy to overthrow authoritarian U. S. regime.

Name: Night of the Lepus
Description: Giant mutant rabbits terrorize the south-west.

Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
Description: A psychiatrist familiar with knife-wielding dream demon Freddy Krueger helps teens at a mental hospital battle the killer who is invading their dreams.

Name: Bruce Almighty
Description: A whiny news reporter is given the chance to step into God's shoes.

Name: Beauty and the Beast
Description: A selfish Prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

Name: The Power
Description: In 1974 a young nurse is forced to work the night shift in a crumbling hospital as striking miners switch off the power across Britain; inside the walls lurks a terrifying presence that threatens to consume her and everyone around...

Name: The Lobster

Name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
