Name: Playing with Fire
Description: Beautiful, seductive rich girl Daphne gets her kicks playing mind games; finding and seducing young working-class men until she cruelly kicks them to the curb. But when she comes across handsome med student Nick, she discovers a c...

Name: Tale of the Mummy
Description: Centuries ago, under the sands of ancient Egypt, a Prince was buried and his tomb eternally cursed so that no man would ever again suffer from his evil ways. But hundreds of years later on a greedy search for treasure, a group of ...

Name: The Tall Man
Description: When her child goes missing, a mother looks to unravel the legend of the Tall Man, an entity who allegedly abducts children.

Name: Pacific Heights
Description: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

Name: Pickup on South Street

Name: Dreamcatcher

Name: Lone Star

Name: Quicksilver
Description: Jack was doing great trading shares until he wasn't. He gets a job on a bike at Quicksilver speed delivery. There he befriends Hector and the cute Terri. Jack gets an enemy in the criminal Gypsy.

Name: Halloween

Name: Rapporto Fuller, base Stoccolma
Description: Ken Clark is a race car driver and a good one. Some how, he becomes entangled in espionage involving a Russian Ballerina and a secret document called the Fuller Report. Not being any kind of a secret agent, Dick Worth [Clark] has ...

Name: Le violon rouge

Name: The Detective

Name: Assassin
Description: A man dies as part of an experimental military program. A former black-ops soldier takes his place to find who killed him.

Name: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid

Name: 21 Grams

Name: The Deadly Mantis

Name: Intersection

Name: Candyman
Description: A sequel to the horror film O Assassino em S√©rie (1992) that returns to the now-gentrified Chicago neighborhood where the legend began.

Name: The Boys Next Door
Description: Roy and Bo leave their small California town the weekend after graduation for a short road trip to Los Angeles. Soon, they find themselves lashing out and leaving a trail of bodies behind them. The violence escalates throughout.

Name: The Boss of Big Town

Name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
Description: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens on Halloween Eve and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

Name: Blood and Bones
Description: An eight part anthology centered on unethical behavior in a hyper-contemporary society.

Name: The Shadow Walkers
Description: Shadow Walkers is a highly suspenseful story of a group of lab technicians and military personnel who awaken in a subterranean laboratory with no memory of who they are. They quickly discover that they are sealed in, with only one...

Name: Il fantasma di Sodoma
Description: Six teenagers are terrorized in an isolated villa by ghosts of Nazis killed during World War II by an air raid while participating in an orgy.

Name: Niagara
Description: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

Description: A former Special Ops soldier leads a group of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea: their mission is obtain the rights to the unusual treasure that the island beholds.

Description: Eddie is a Vietnam veteran who loses his arms and legs when he steps on a land mine. A brilliant surgeon is able to attach new limbs but his jealous assistant switches the DNA injections, transforming him into a gigantic killer.

Name: Simone
Description: A mysterious, erotic and haunting love story between a writer/professor at Puerto Rico's leading University and an aspiring artist from the immigrant Chinese community.

Description: A law enforcement officer is forced to go rogue when an unthinkably cruel and dangerous maniac murders innocent victims in gruesome ways.

Name: Betrayed

Name: Anna
Description: Beneath Anna Poliatova's striking beauty lies a secret that will unleash her indelible strength and skill to become one of the world's most feared government assassins.

Name: The Plague of the Zombies
Description: Young workers are dying because of a mysterious epidemic in a little village in Cornwall. Doctor Thompson is helpless and asks professor James Forbes for help. The professor and his daughter Sylvia travel to Thomson. Terrible thin...

Name: Godforsaken
Description: Indie doc crew travels to a small town to document a bizarre and seemingly unnatural case, ending in extreme tragedy.

Name: Night of the Demons 2

Name: Slam Dance

Name: Maniac

Name: Doll Face
Description: When the beautiful yet timid Marmalade inherits her grandmother's palatial condo, there is an odd string attached: she must care for each and every doll in her grandmother's extensive collection, or lose her inheritance. Quickly, ...

Name: Karakter

Name: Navy Seals vs. Zombies

Name: Ching yan
Description: A traffic accident changed their lives forever. In capturing wanted criminal Zhang Yidong, Sergeant Tang Fei (Nicholas Tse) was involved in a gunfight and car accident that put the criminal in a coma. But in the process he also cr...

Name: Fargo
Description: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

Name: Blackrock

Name: Nighthawks
Description: Wide-eyed Midwest transplant Stan (Chace Crawford) agrees to play wingman to his calculating and privileged roommate Chad (Kevin Zegers) as they embark upon an exploration of glittering New York nightlife, whose darkest secrets ar...

Name: Vanilla Sky

Name: The Stepfather
Description: Michael Harding (Penn Badgely) returns home from military school to find his mother Susan (Sela Ward) happily in love and living with her new boyfriend David (Dylan Walsh). As the two men get to know each other, he becomes more an...

Name: The Prophecy II
Description: When the powers of good and evil again descend to Earth in a battle over mankind, the only hope for survival is the unborn child of an innocent woman. With the help of a mysterious stranger, she races to protect her child and save...

Description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

Name: ¬°Vampiros en La Habana!

Name: Resident Evil: Death Island

Meanwhile, B.S.A.A. agent Chris Redfield is investigating a zombie outbreak in San Francisco, where the cause of the infection cannot be identified. The only thing the victims have in common is that they all visited Alcatraz Island re... Read all

Name: La mort en direct

Name: Fifty Shades Darker
Description: While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her.

Name: Necromancer 2020
Description: Win is the only survivor from a black magic attack that has taken away his father's sacred amulet. When he come back for revenge with a powerful sorcery, he is faced with a new powerful cult that help people to be wealthy but hide...

Name: Symptoms

Name: Gabriel
Description: Gabriel the archangel fights to bring light back to purgatory - a place where darkness rules - and save the souls of the city's inhabitants.

Name: Miel√∂tt befejezi r√∂pt√©t a denev√©r
Description: How far can one person go when love becomes obsession?

Name: Joe
Description: An ex-con, who is the unlikeliest of role models, meets a 15-year-old boy and is faced with the choice of redemption or ruin.

Name: True Crime
Description: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

Name: The Inheritance
Description: A woman's inheritance leads her to Eastern Europe to uncover a dark and disturbing family secret.

Name: The Hour of the Pig
Description: In medieval France, young lawyer Richard Courtois leaves Paris for the simpler life in the country. However, he is soon drawn into amorous and political intrigues. At the same time, he is pushed to defend a pig, owned by the myste...

Description: Two cab drivers search San Francisco's Chinatown for the mysterious Chan, who disappeared with their $4000.

Name: Traffic
Description: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife ...

Name: La diagonale du fou

Name: Persona
Description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

Name: Delta Force Commando II: Priority Red One
Description: This brillant action packed sequel once again centers upon the courageous exploits of a secret, elite cadre of American jet fighters fighting to keep the world safe from communism and demented despot rulers. This time they must st...

Name: Snow Falling on Cedars

Name: Resident Evil: Damnation

Name: Audrey Rose

Name: R.S.V.P.

Name: Life

Name: Blood Beach

Name: Random Hearts
Description: Police Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broek (Harrison Ford) and U.S. Representative Kay Chandler (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each ot...

Description: The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

Name: Johnny Handsome

Name: Timescape
Description: Before they can complete renovations on their new inn, Widower (Ben Wilson) and daughter (Hillary) are visited by a woman seeking immediate lodging for her strange group of travellers. Why they won't stay at the hotel in town is j...

Name: Vengeance
Description: A writer from New York City attempts to solve the murder of a girl he hooked up with and travels down south to investigate the circumstances of her death and discover what happened to her.

Name: The Black Panther
Description: A gung-ho ex-military man pursues a secret life of crime, culminating in the kidnapping of a teenage heiress.

Name: Rockula
Description: A young vampire cannot lose his virginity because of a curse imposed upon him centuries ago.

Name: The Shanghai Cobra

Name: P√©ril en la demeure
Description: A magnate and his younger wife hire David to teach guitar to their teenage daughter. The wife quickly seduces David, and simultaneously he strikes up an acquaintance with the family's inquisitive neighbor. One night, David is mugg...
